  2963.                     if (function_exists('mime_content_type')) {
  2964.                         $this->file_src_mime = mime_content_type($this->file_src_pathname);
  2965.                         $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;MIME type detected as ' . $this->file_src_mime . ' by mime_content_type()<br />';
  2966.                         if (preg_match("/^([\.-\w]+)\/([\.-\w]+)(.*)$/i", $this->file_src_mime)) {
  2967.                             $this->file_src_mime = preg_replace("/^([\.-\w]+)\/([\.-\w]+)(.*)$/i", '$1/$2', $this->file_src_mime);
  2968.                             $this->log .= '-&nbsp;MIME validated as ' . $this->file_src_mime . '<br />';
  2969.                         } else {
  2970.                             $this->file_src_mime = null;
  2971.                         }
  2972.                     } else {
  2973.                         $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mime_content_type() is not available<br />';
  2974.                     }
  2975.                 } else {
  2976.                     $this->log .= '- mime.magic file (mime_content_type()) is deactivated<br />';
  2977.                 }
  2978.             }
  2979.  
  2980.             // checks MIME type with getimagesize()
  2981.             if (!$this->file_src_mime || !is_string($this->file_src_mime) || empty($this->file_src_mime) || strpos($this->file_src_mime, '/') === FALSE) {
  2982.                 if ($this->mime_getimagesize) {
  2983.                     $this->log .= '- Checking MIME type with getimagesize()<br />';
  2984.                     $info = getimagesize($this->file_src_pathname);
  2985.                     if (is_array($info) && array_key_exists('mime', $info)) {
  2986.                         $this->file_src_mime = trim($info['mime']);
  2987.                         if (empty($this->file_src_mime)) {
  2988.                             $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;MIME empty, guessing from type<br />';
  2989.                             $mime = (is_array($info) && array_key_exists(2, $info) ? $info[2] : null); // 1 = GIF, 2 = JPG, 3 = PNG
  2990.                             $this->file_src_mime = ($mime==IMAGETYPE_GIF ? 'image/gif' : ($mime==IMAGETYPE_JPEG ? 'image/jpeg' : ($mime==IMAGETYPE_PNG ? 'image/png' : ($mime==IMAGETYPE_BMP ? 'image/bmp' : null))));
  2991.                         }
  2992.                         $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;MIME type detected as ' . $this->file_src_mime . ' by PHP getimagesize() function<br />';
  2993.                         if (preg_match("/^([\.-\w]+)\/([\.-\w]+)(.*)$/i", $this->file_src_mime)) {
  2994.                             $this->file_src_mime = preg_replace("/^([\.-\w]+)\/([\.-\w]+)(.*)$/i", '$1/$2', $this->file_src_mime);
  2995.                             $this->log .= '-&nbsp;MIME validated as ' . $this->file_src_mime . '<br />';
  2996.                         } else {
  2997.                             $this->file_src_mime = null;
  2998.                         }
  2999.                     } else {
  3000.                         $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;getimagesize() failed<br />';
  3001.                     }
  3002.                 } else {
  3003.                     $this->log .= '- getimagesize() is deactivated<br />';
  3004.                 }
  3005.             }
  3006.  
  3007.             // default to MIME from browser (or Flash)
  3008.             if (!empty($mime_from_browser) && !$this->file_src_mime || !is_string($this->file_src_mime) || empty($this->file_src_mime)) {
  3009.                 $this->file_src_mime =$mime_from_browser;
  3010.                 $this->log .= '- MIME type detected as ' . $this->file_src_mime . ' by browser<br />';
  3011.                 if (preg_match("/^([\.-\w]+)\/([\.-\w]+)(.*)$/i", $this->file_src_mime)) {
  3012.                     $this->file_src_mime = preg_replace("/^([\.-\w]+)\/([\.-\w]+)(.*)$/i", '$1/$2', $this->file_src_mime);
  3013.                     $this->log .= '-&nbsp;MIME validated as ' . $this->file_src_mime . '<br />';
  3014.                 } else {
  3015.                     $this->file_src_mime = null;
  3016.                 }
  3017.             }
  3018.  
  3019.             // we need to work some magic if we upload via Flash
  3020.             if ($this->file_src_mime == 'application/octet-stream' || !$this->file_src_mime || !is_string($this->file_src_mime) || empty($this->file_src_mime) || strpos($this->file_src_mime, '/') === FALSE) {
  3021.                 if ($this->file_src_mime == 'application/octet-stream') $this->log .= '- Flash may be rewriting MIME as application/octet-stream<br />';
  3022.                 $this->log .= '- Try to guess MIME type from file extension (' . $this->file_src_name_ext . '): ';
  3023.                 if (array_key_exists($this->file_src_name_ext, $this->mime_types)) $this->file_src_mime = $this->mime_types[$this->file_src_name_ext];
  3024.                 if ($this->file_src_mime == 'application/octet-stream') {
  3025.                     $this->log .= 'doesn\'t look like anything known<br />';
  3026.                 } else {
  3027.                     $this->log .= 'MIME type set to ' . $this->file_src_mime . '<br />';
  3028.                 }
  3029.             }
  3030.  
  3031.             if (!$this->file_src_mime || !is_string($this->file_src_mime) || empty($this->file_src_mime) || strpos($this->file_src_mime, '/') === FALSE) {
  3032.                 $this->log .= '- MIME type couldn\'t be detected! (' . (string) $this->file_src_mime . ')<br />';
  3033.             }
  3034.  
  3035.             // determine whether the file is an image
  3036.             if ($this->file_src_mime && is_string($this->file_src_mime) && !empty($this->file_src_mime) && array_key_exists($this->file_src_mime, $this->image_supported)) {
  3037.                 $this->file_is_image = true;
  3038.                 $this->image_src_type = $this->image_supported[$this->file_src_mime];
  3039.             }
  3040.  
  3041.             // if the file is an image, we gather some useful data
  3042.             if ($this->file_is_image) {
  3043.                 if ($h = fopen($this->file_src_pathname, 'r')) {
  3044.                     fclose($h);
  3045.                     $info = getimagesize($this->file_src_pathname);
  3046.                     if (is_array($info)) {
  3047.                         $this->image_src_x    = $info[0];
  3048.                         $this->image_src_y    = $info[1];
  3049.                         $this->image_dst_x    = $this->image_src_x;
  3050.                         $this->image_dst_y    = $this->image_src_y;
  3051.                         $this->image_src_pixels = $this->image_src_x * $this->image_src_y;
  3052.                         $this->image_src_bits = array_key_exists('bits', $info) ? $info['bits'] : null;
  3053.                     } else {
  3054.                         $this->file_is_image = false;
  3055.                         $this->uploaded = false;
  3056.                         $this->log .= '- can\'t retrieve image information, image may have been tampered with<br />';
  3057.                         $this->error = $this->translate('source_invalid');
  3058.                     }
  3059.                 } else {
  3060.                     $this->log .= '- can\'t read source file directly. open_basedir restriction in place?<br />';
  3061.                 }
  3062.             }
  3063.  
  3064.             $this->log .= '<b>source variables</b><br />';
  3065.             $this->log .= '- You can use all these before calling process()<br />';
  3066.             $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;file_src_name         : ' . $this->file_src_name . '<br />';
  3067.             $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;file_src_name_body    : ' . $this->file_src_name_body . '<br />';
  3068.             $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;file_src_name_ext     : ' . $this->file_src_name_ext . '<br />';
  3069.             $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;file_src_pathname     : ' . $this->file_src_pathname . '<br />';
  3070.             $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;file_src_mime         : ' . $this->file_src_mime . '<br />';
  3071.             $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;file_src_size         : ' . $this->file_src_size . ' (max= ' . $this->file_max_size . ')<br />';
  3072.             $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;file_src_error        : ' . $this->file_src_error . '<br />';
  3073.  
  3074.             if ($this->file_is_image) {
  3075.                 $this->log .= '- source file is an image<br />';
  3076.                 $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;image_src_x           : ' . $this->image_src_x . '<br />';
  3077.                 $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;image_src_y           : ' . $this->image_src_y . '<br />';
  3078.                 $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;image_src_pixels      : ' . $this->image_src_pixels . '<br />';
  3079.                 $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;image_src_type        : ' . $this->image_src_type . '<br />';
  3080.                 $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;image_src_bits        : ' . $this->image_src_bits . '<br />';
  3081.             }
  3082.         }
  3083.  
  3084.     }
  3085.  
  3086.     /**
  3087.      * Returns the version of GD
  3088.      *
  3089.      * @access public
  3090.      * @param  boolean  $full Optional flag to get precise version
  3091.      * @return float GD version
  3092.      */
  3093.     function gdversion($full = false) {
  3094.         static $gd_version = null;
  3095.         static $gd_full_version = null;
  3096.         if ($gd_version === null) {
  3097.             if (function_exists('gd_info')) {
  3098.                 $gd = gd_info();
  3099.                 $gd = $gd["GD Version"];
  3100.                 $regex = "/([\d\.]+)/i";
  3101.             } else {
  3102.                 ob_start();
  3103.                 phpinfo(8);
  3104.                 $gd = ob_get_contents();
  3105.                 ob_end_clean();
  3106.                 $regex = "/\bgd\s+version\b[^\d\n\r]+?([\d\.]+)/i";
  3107.             }
  3108.             if (preg_match($regex, $gd, $m)) {
  3109.                 $gd_full_version = (string) $m[1];
  3110.                 $gd_version = (float) $m[1];
  3111.             } else {
  3112.                 $gd_full_version = 'none';
  3113.                 $gd_version = 0;
  3114.             }
  3115.         }
  3116.         if ($full) {
  3117.             return $gd_full_version;
  3118.         } else {
  3119.             return $gd_version;
  3120.         }
  3121.     }
  3122.  
  3123.     /**
  3124.      * Creates directories recursively
  3125.      *
  3126.      * @access private
  3127.      * @param  string  $path Path to create
  3128.      * @param  integer $mode Optional permissions
  3129.      * @return boolean Success
  3130.      */
  3131.     function rmkdir($path, $mode = 0777) {
  3132.         return is_dir($path) || ( $this->rmkdir(dirname($path), $mode) && $this->_mkdir($path, $mode) );
  3133.     }
  3134.  
  3135.     /**
  3136.      * Creates directory
  3137.      *
  3138.      * @access private
  3139.      * @param  string  $path Path to create
  3140.      * @param  integer $mode Optional permissions
  3141.      * @return boolean Success
  3142.      */
  3143.     function _mkdir($path, $mode = 0777) {
  3144.         $old = umask(0);
  3145.         $res = @mkdir($path, $mode);
  3146.         umask($old);
  3147.         return $res;
  3148.     }
  3149.  
  3150.     /**
  3151.      * Translate error messages
  3152.      *
  3153.      * @access private
  3154.      * @param  string  $str    Message to translate
  3155.      * @param  array   $tokens Optional token values
  3156.      * @return string Translated string
  3157.      */
  3158.     function translate($str, $tokens = array()) {
  3159.         if (array_key_exists($str, $this->translation)) $str = $this->translation[$str];
  3160.         if (is_array($tokens) && sizeof($tokens) > 0)   $str = vsprintf($str, $tokens);
  3161.         return $str;
  3162.     }
  3163.  
  3164.     /**
  3165.      * Returns the temp directory
  3166.      *
  3167.      * @access private
  3168.      * @return string Temp directory string
  3169.      */
  3170.     function temp_dir() {
  3171.         $dir = '';
  3172.         if (function_exists('sys_get_temp_dir')) $dir = sys_get_temp_dir();
  3173.         if (!$dir && $tmp=getenv('TMP'))    $dir = $tmp;
  3174.         if (!$dir && $tmp=getenv('TEMP'))   $dir = $tmp;
  3175.         if (!$dir && $tmp=getenv('TMPDIR')) $dir = $tmp;
  3176.         if (!$dir) {
  3177.             $tmp = tempnam(__FILE__,'');
  3178.             if (file_exists($tmp)) {
  3179.                 unlink($tmp);
  3180.                 $dir = dirname($tmp);
  3181.             }
  3182.         }
  3183.         if (!$dir) return '';
  3184.         $slash = (strtolower(substr(PHP_OS, 0, 3)) === 'win' ? '\\' : '/');
  3185.         if (substr($dir, -1) != $slash) $dir = $dir . $slash;
  3186.         return $dir;
  3187.     }
  3188.  
  3189.     /**
  3190.      * Decodes colors
  3191.      *
  3192.      * @access private
  3193.      * @param  string  $color  Color string
  3194.      * @return array RGB colors
  3195.      */
  3196.     function getcolors($color) {
  3197.         $color = str_replace('#', '', $color);
  3198.         if (strlen($color) == 3) $color = str_repeat(substr($color, 0, 1), 2) . str_repeat(substr($color, 1, 1), 2) . str_repeat(substr($color, 2, 1), 2);
  3199.         $r = sscanf($color, "%2x%2x%2x");
  3200.         $red   = (is_array($r) && array_key_exists(0, $r) && is_numeric($r[0]) ? $r[0] : 0);
  3201.         $green = (is_array($r) && array_key_exists(1, $r) && is_numeric($r[1]) ? $r[1] : 0);
  3202.         $blue  = (is_array($r) && array_key_exists(2, $r) && is_numeric($r[2]) ? $r[2] : 0);
  3203.         return array($red, $green, $blue);
  3204.     }
  3205.  
  3206.     /**
  3207.      * Decodes sizes
  3208.      *
  3209.      * @access private
  3210.      * @param  string  $size  Size in bytes, or shorthand byte options
  3211.      * @return integer Size in bytes
  3212.      */
  3213.     function getsize($size) {
  3214.         $last = strtolower($size{strlen($size)-1});
  3215.         switch($last) {
  3216.             case 'g':
  3217.                 $size *= 1024;
  3218.             case 'm':
  3219.                 $size *= 1024;
  3220.             case 'k':
  3221.                 $size *= 1024;
  3222.         }
  3223.         return $size;
  3224.     }
  3225.  
  3226.     /**
  3227.      * Decodes offsets
  3228.      *
  3229.      * @access private
  3230.      * @param  misc    $offsets  Offsets, as an integer, a string or an array
  3231.      * @param  integer $x        Reference picture width
  3232.      * @param  integer $y        Reference picture height
  3233.      * @param  boolean $round    Round offsets before returning them
  3234.      * @param  boolean $negative Allow negative offsets to be returned
  3235.      * @return array Array of four offsets (TRBL)
  3236.      */
  3237.     function getoffsets($offsets, $x, $y, $round = true, $negative = true) {
  3238.         if (!is_array($offsets)) $offsets = explode(' ', $offsets);
  3239.         if (sizeof($offsets) == 4) {
  3240.              $ct = $offsets[0]; $cr = $offsets[1]; $cb = $offsets[2]; $cl = $offsets[3];
  3241.         } else if (sizeof($offsets) == 2) {
  3242.             $ct = $offsets[0]; $cr = $offsets[1]; $cb = $offsets[0]; $cl = $offsets[1];
  3243.         } else {
  3244.             $ct = $offsets[0]; $cr = $offsets[0]; $cb = $offsets[0]; $cl = $offsets[0];
  3245.         }
  3246.         if (strpos($ct, '%')>0) $ct = $y * (str_replace('%','',$ct) / 100);
  3247.         if (strpos($cr, '%')>0) $cr = $x * (str_replace('%','',$cr) / 100);
  3248.         if (strpos($cb, '%')>0) $cb = $y * (str_replace('%','',$cb) / 100);
  3249.         if (strpos($cl, '%')>0) $cl = $x * (str_replace('%','',$cl) / 100);
  3250.         if (strpos($ct, 'px')>0) $ct = str_replace('px','',$ct);
  3251.         if (strpos($cr, 'px')>0) $cr = str_replace('px','',$cr);
  3252.         if (strpos($cb, 'px')>0) $cb = str_replace('px','',$cb);
  3253.         if (strpos($cl, 'px')>0) $cl = str_replace('px','',$cl);
  3254.         $ct = (int) $ct; $cr = (int) $cr; $cb = (int) $cb; $cl = (int) $cl;
  3255.         if ($round) { 
  3256.             $ct = round($ct); 
  3257.             $cr = round($cr); 
  3258.             $cb = round($cb); 
  3259.             $cl = round($cl); 
  3260.         }
  3261.         if (!$negative) { 
  3262.             if ($ct < 0) $ct = 0;
  3263.             if ($cr < 0) $cr = 0;
  3264.             if ($cb < 0) $cb = 0;
  3265.             if ($cl < 0) $cl = 0;
  3266.         }
  3267.         return array($ct, $cr, $cb, $cl);
  3268.     }
  3269.  
  3270.     /**
  3271.      * Creates a container image
  3272.      *
  3273.      * @access private
  3274.      * @param  integer  $x    Width
  3275.      * @param  integer  $y    Height
  3276.      * @param  boolean  $fill Optional flag to draw the background color or not
  3277.      * @param  boolean  $trsp Optional flag to set the background to be transparent
  3278.      * @return resource Container image
  3279.      */
  3280.     function imagecreatenew($x, $y, $fill = true, $trsp = false) {
  3281.         if ($x < 1) $x = 1; if ($y < 1) $y = 1;
  3282.         if ($this->gdversion() >= 2 && !$this->image_is_palette) {
  3283.             // create a true color image
  3284.             $dst_im = imagecreatetruecolor($x, $y);
  3285.             // this preserves transparency in PNGs, in true color
  3286.             if (empty($this->image_background_color) || $trsp) {
  3287.                 imagealphablending($dst_im, false );
  3288.                 imagefilledrectangle($dst_im, 0, 0, $x, $y, imagecolorallocatealpha($dst_im, 0, 0, 0, 127));
  3289.             }
  3290.         } else {
  3291.             // creates a palette image
  3292.             $dst_im = imagecreate($x, $y);
  3293.             // preserves transparency for palette images, if the original image has transparency
  3294.             if (($fill && $this->image_is_transparent && empty($this->image_background_color)) || $trsp) {
  3295.                 imagefilledrectangle($dst_im, 0, 0, $x, $y, $this->image_transparent_color);
  3296.                 imagecolortransparent($dst_im, $this->image_transparent_color);
  3297.             }
  3298.         }
  3299.         // fills with background color if any is set
  3300.         if ($fill && !empty($this->image_background_color) && !$trsp) {
  3301.             list($red, $green, $blue) = $this->getcolors($this->image_background_color);
  3302.             $background_color = imagecolorallocate($dst_im, $red, $green, $blue);
  3303.             imagefilledrectangle($dst_im, 0, 0, $x, $y, $background_color);
  3304.         }
  3305.         return $dst_im;
  3306.     }
  3307.  
  3308.  
  3309.     /**
  3310.      * Transfers an image from the container to the destination image
  3311.      *
  3312.      * @access private
  3313.      * @param  resource $src_im Container image
  3314.      * @param  resource $dst_im Destination image
  3315.      * @return resource Destination image
  3316.      */
  3317.     function imagetransfer($src_im, $dst_im) {
  3318.         if (is_resource($dst_im)) imagedestroy($dst_im);
  3319.         $dst_im = & $src_im;
  3320.         return $dst_im;
  3321.     }
  3322.  
  3323.     /**
  3324.      * Merges two images
  3325.      *
  3326.      * If the output format is PNG, then we do it pixel per pixel to retain the alpha channel
  3327.      *
  3328.      * @access private
  3329.      * @param  resource $dst_img Destination image
  3330.      * @param  resource $src_img Overlay image
  3331.      * @param  int      $dst_x   x-coordinate of destination point
  3332.      * @param  int      $dst_y   y-coordinate of destination point
  3333.      * @param  int      $src_x   x-coordinate of source point
  3334.      * @param  int      $src_y   y-coordinate of source point
  3335.      * @param  int      $src_w   Source width
  3336.      * @param  int      $src_h   Source height
  3337.      * @param  int      $pct     Optional percentage of the overlay, between 0 and 100 (default: 100)
  3338.      * @return resource Destination image
  3339.      */
  3340.     function imagecopymergealpha(&$dst_im, &$src_im, $dst_x, $dst_y, $src_x, $src_y, $src_w, $src_h, $pct = 0) {
  3341.         $dst_x = (int) $dst_x;
  3342.         $dst_y = (int) $dst_y;
  3343.         $src_x = (int) $src_x;
  3344.         $src_y = (int) $src_y;
  3345.         $src_w = (int) $src_w;
  3346.         $src_h = (int) $src_h;
  3347.         $pct   = (int) $pct;
  3348.         $dst_w = imagesx($dst_im);
  3349.         $dst_h = imagesy($dst_im);
  3350.  
  3351.         for ($y = $src_y; $y < $src_h; $y++) {
  3352.             for ($x = $src_x; $x < $src_w; $x++) {
  3353.  
  3354.                 if ($x + $dst_x >= 0 && $x + $dst_x < $dst_w && $x + $src_x >= 0 && $x + $src_x < $src_w
  3355.                  && $y + $dst_y >= 0 && $y + $dst_y < $dst_h && $y + $src_y >= 0 && $y + $src_y < $src_h) {
  3356.  
  3357.                     $dst_pixel = imagecolorsforindex($dst_im, imagecolorat($dst_im, $x + $dst_x, $y + $dst_y));
  3358.                     $src_pixel = imagecolorsforindex($src_im, imagecolorat($src_im, $x + $src_x, $y + $src_y));
  3359.  
  3360.                     $src_alpha = 1 - ($src_pixel['alpha'] / 127);
  3361.                     $dst_alpha = 1 - ($dst_pixel['alpha'] / 127);
  3362.                     $opacity = $src_alpha * $pct / 100;
  3363.                     if ($dst_alpha >= $opacity) $alpha = $dst_alpha;
  3364.                     if ($dst_alpha < $opacity)  $alpha = $opacity;
  3365.                     if ($alpha > 1) $alpha = 1;
  3366.  
  3367.                     if ($opacity > 0) {
  3368.                         $dst_red   = round(( ($dst_pixel['red']   * $dst_alpha * (1 - $opacity)) ) );
  3369.                         $dst_green = round(( ($dst_pixel['green'] * $dst_alpha * (1 - $opacity)) ) );
  3370.                         $dst_blue  = round(( ($dst_pixel['blue']  * $dst_alpha * (1 - $opacity)) ) );
  3371.                         $src_red   = round((($src_pixel['red']   * $opacity)) );
  3372.                         $src_green = round((($src_pixel['green'] * $opacity)) );
  3373.                         $src_blue  = round((($src_pixel['blue']  * $opacity)) );
  3374.                         $red   = round(($dst_red   + $src_red  ) / ($dst_alpha * (1 - $opacity) + $opacity));
  3375.                         $green = round(($dst_green + $src_green) / ($dst_alpha * (1 - $opacity) + $opacity));
  3376.                         $blue  = round(($dst_blue  + $src_blue ) / ($dst_alpha * (1 - $opacity) + $opacity));
  3377.                         if ($red   > 255) $red   = 255;
  3378.                         if ($green > 255) $green = 255;
  3379.                         if ($blue  > 255) $blue  = 255;
  3380.                         $alpha =  round((1 - $alpha) * 127);
  3381.                         $color = imagecolorallocatealpha($dst_im, $red, $green, $blue, $alpha);
  3382.                         imagesetpixel($dst_im, $x + $dst_x, $y + $dst_y, $color);
  3383.                     }
  3384.                 }
  3385.             }
  3386.         }
  3387.         return true;
  3388.     }
  3389.  
  3390.  
  3391.  
  3392.     /**
  3393.      * Actually uploads the file, and act on it according to the set processing class variables
  3394.      *
  3395.      * This function copies the uploaded file to the given location, eventually performing actions on it.
  3396.      * Typically, you can call {@link process} several times for the same file,
  3397.      * for instance to create a resized image and a thumbnail of the same file.
  3398.      * The original uploaded file remains intact in its temporary location, so you can use {@link process} several times.
  3399.      * You will be able to delete the uploaded file with {@link clean} when you have finished all your {@link process} calls.
  3400.      *
  3401.      * According to the processing class variables set in the calling file, the file can be renamed,
  3402.      * and if it is an image, can be resized or converted.
  3403.      *
  3404.      * When the processing is completed, and the file copied to its new location, the
  3405.      * processing class variables will be reset to their default value.
  3406.      * This allows you to set new properties, and perform another {@link process} on the same uploaded file
  3407.      *
  3408.      * If the function is called with a null or empty argument, then it will return the content of the picture
  3409.      *
  3410.      * It will set {@link processed} (and {@link error} is an error occurred)
  3411.      *
  3412.      * @access public
  3413.      * @param  string $server_path Optional path location of the uploaded file, with an ending slash
  3414.      * @return string Optional content of the image
  3415.      */
  3416.     function process($server_path = null) {
  3417.         $this->error        = '';
  3418.         $this->processed    = true;
  3419.         $return_mode        = false;
  3420.         $return_content     = null;
  3421.  
  3422.         // clean up dst variables
  3423.         $this->file_dst_path        = '';
  3424.         $this->file_dst_pathname    = '';
  3425.         $this->file_dst_name        = '';
  3426.         $this->file_dst_name_body   = '';
  3427.         $this->file_dst_name_ext    = '';
  3428.  
  3429.         // clean up some parameters
  3430.         $this->file_max_size = $this->getsize($this->file_max_size);
  3431.         $this->jpeg_size = $this->getsize($this->jpeg_size);
  3432.         // some parameters are being deprecated, and replaced with others
  3433.         if (is_null($this->image_overlay_opacity)) $this->image_overlay_opacity = $this->image_overlay_percent;
  3434.         if ($this->image_text_opacity == 100) $this->image_text_opacity = $this->image_text_percent;
  3435.         if ($this->image_text_background_opacity == 100) $this->image_text_background_opacity = $this->image_text_background_percent;
  3436.  
  3437.         // copy some variables as we need to keep them clean
  3438.         $file_src_name = $this->file_src_name;
  3439.         $file_src_name_body = $this->file_src_name_body;
  3440.         $file_src_name_ext = $this->file_src_name_ext;
  3441.  
  3442.         if (!$this->uploaded) {
  3443.             $this->error = $this->translate('file_not_uploaded');
  3444.             $this->processed = false;
  3445.         }
  3446.  
  3447.         if ($this->processed) {
  3448.             if (empty($server_path) || is_null($server_path)) {
  3449.                 $this->log .= '<b>process file and return the content</b><br />';
  3450.                 $return_mode = true;
  3451.             } else {
  3452.                 if(strtolower(substr(PHP_OS, 0, 3)) === 'win') {
  3453.                     if (substr($server_path, -1, 1) != '\\') $server_path = $server_path . '\\';
  3454.                 } else {
  3455.                     if (substr($server_path, -1, 1) != '/') $server_path = $server_path . '/';
  3456.                 }
  3457.                 $this->log .= '<b>process file to '  . $server_path . '</b><br />';
  3458.             }
  3459.         }
  3460.  
  3461.         if ($this->processed) {
  3462.             // checks file max size
  3463.             if ($this->file_src_size > $this->file_max_size) {
  3464.                 $this->processed = false;
  3465.                 $this->error = $this->translate('file_too_big');
  3466.             } else {
  3467.                 $this->log .= '- file size OK<br />';
  3468.             }
  3469.         }
  3470.  
  3471.         if ($this->processed) {
  3472.             // if we have an image without extension, set it
  3473.             if ($this->file_force_extension && $this->file_is_image && !$this->file_src_name_ext) $file_src_name_ext = $this->image_src_type;
  3474.             // turn dangerous scripts into text files
  3475.             if ($this->no_script) {
  3476.                 // if the file has no extension, we try to guess it from the MIME type
  3477.                 if ($this->file_force_extension && empty($file_src_name_ext)) {
  3478.                     if ($key = array_search($this->file_src_mime, $this->mime_types)) {
  3479.                         $file_src_name_ext = $key;
  3480.                         $file_src_name = $file_src_name_body . '.' . $file_src_name_ext;
  3481.                         $this->log .= '- file renamed as ' . $file_src_name_body . '.' . $file_src_name_ext . '!<br />';
  3482.                     }
  3483.                 }
  3484.                 // if the file is text based, or has a dangerous extension, we rename it as .txt
  3485.                 if ((((substr($this->file_src_mime, 0, 5) == 'text/' && $this->file_src_mime != 'text/rtf') || strpos($this->file_src_mime, 'javascript') !== false)  && (substr($file_src_name, -4) != '.txt'))
  3486.                     || preg_match('/\.(php|php5|php4|php3|phtml|pl|py|cgi|asp|js)$/i', $this->file_src_name)
  3487.                     || $this->file_force_extension && empty($file_src_name_ext)) {
  3488.                     $this->file_src_mime = 'text/plain';
  3489.                     if ($this->file_src_name_ext) $file_src_name_body = $file_src_name_body . '.' . $this->file_src_name_ext;
  3490.                     $file_src_name_ext = 'txt';
  3491.                     $file_src_name = $file_src_name_body . '.' . $file_src_name_ext;
  3492.                     $this->log .= '- script renamed as ' . $file_src_name_body . '.' . $file_src_name_ext . '!<br />';
  3493.                 }
  3494.             }
  3495.  
  3496.             if ($this->mime_check && empty($this->file_src_mime)) {
  3497.                 $this->processed = false;
  3498.                 $this->error = $this->translate('no_mime');
  3499.             } else if ($this->mime_check && !empty($this->file_src_mime) && strpos($this->file_src_mime, '/') !== false) {
  3500.                 list($m1, $m2) = explode('/', $this->file_src_mime);
  3501.                 $allowed = false;
  3502.                 // check wether the mime type is allowed
  3503.                 if (!is_array($this->allowed)) $this->allowed = array($this->allowed);
  3504.                 foreach($this->allowed as $k => $v) {
  3505.                     list($v1, $v2) = explode('/', $v);
  3506.                     if (($v1 == '*' && $v2 == '*') || ($v1 == $m1 && ($v2 == $m2 || $v2 == '*'))) {
  3507.                         $allowed = true;
  3508.                         break;
  3509.                     }
  3510.                 }
  3511.                 // check wether the mime type is forbidden
  3512.                 if (!is_array($this->forbidden)) $this->forbidden = array($this->forbidden);
  3513.                 foreach($this->forbidden as $k => $v) {
  3514.                     list($v1, $v2) = explode('/', $v);
  3515.                     if (($v1 == '*' && $v2 == '*') || ($v1 == $m1 && ($v2 == $m2 || $v2 == '*'))) {
  3516.                         $allowed = false;
  3517.                         break;
  3518.                     }
  3519.                 }
  3520.                 if (!$allowed) {
  3521.                     $this->processed = false;
  3522.                     $this->error = $this->translate('incorrect_file');
  3523.                 } else {
  3524.                     $this->log .= '- file mime OK : ' . $this->file_src_mime . '<br />';
  3525.                 }
  3526.             } else {
  3527.                 $this->log .= '- file mime (not checked) : ' . $this->file_src_mime . '<br />';
  3528.             }
  3529.  
  3530.             // if the file is an image, we can check on its dimensions
  3531.             // these checks are not available if open_basedir restrictions are in place
  3532.             if ($this->file_is_image) {
  3533.                 if (is_numeric($this->image_src_x) && is_numeric($this->image_src_y)) {
  3534.                     $ratio = $this->image_src_x / $this->image_src_y;
  3535.                     if (!is_null($this->image_max_width) && $this->image_src_x > $this->image_max_width) {
  3536.                         $this->processed = false;
  3537.                         $this->error = $this->translate('image_too_wide');
  3538.                     }
  3539.                     if (!is_null($this->image_min_width) && $this->image_src_x < $this->image_min_width) {
  3540.                         $this->processed = false;
  3541.                         $this->error = $this->translate('image_too_narrow');
  3542.                     }
  3543.                     if (!is_null($this->image_max_height) && $this->image_src_y > $this->image_max_height) {
  3544.                         $this->processed = false;
  3545.                         $this->error = $this->translate('image_too_high');
  3546.                     }
  3547.                     if (!is_null($this->image_min_height) && $this->image_src_y < $this->image_min_height) {
  3548.                         $this->processed = false;
  3549.                         $this->error = $this->translate('image_too_short');
  3550.                     }
  3551.                     if (!is_null($this->image_max_ratio) && $ratio > $this->image_max_ratio) {
  3552.                         $this->processed = false;
  3553.                         $this->error = $this->translate('ratio_too_high');
  3554.                     }
  3555.                     if (!is_null($this->image_min_ratio) && $ratio < $this->image_min_ratio) {
  3556.                         $this->processed = false;
  3557.                         $this->error = $this->translate('ratio_too_low');
  3558.                     }
  3559.                     if (!is_null($this->image_max_pixels) && $this->image_src_pixels > $this->image_max_pixels) {
  3560.                         $this->processed = false;
  3561.                         $this->error = $this->translate('too_many_pixels');
  3562.                     }
  3563.                     if (!is_null($this->image_min_pixels) && $this->image_src_pixels < $this->image_min_pixels) {
  3564.                         $this->processed = false;
  3565.                         $this->error = $this->translate('not_enough_pixels');
  3566.                     }
  3567.                 } else {
  3568.                     $this->log .= '- no image properties available, can\'t enforce dimension checks : ' . $this->file_src_mime . '<br />';
  3569.                 }
  3570.             }
  3571.         }
  3572.  
  3573.         if ($this->processed) {
  3574.             $this->file_dst_path        = $server_path;
  3575.  
  3576.             // repopulate dst variables from src
  3577.             $this->file_dst_name        = $file_src_name;
  3578.             $this->file_dst_name_body   = $file_src_name_body;
  3579.             $this->file_dst_name_ext    = $file_src_name_ext;
  3580.             if ($this->file_overwrite) $this->file_auto_rename = false;
  3581.  
  3582.             if ($this->image_convert && $this->file_is_image) { // if we convert as an image
  3583.                 if ($this->file_src_name_ext) $this->file_dst_name_ext  = $this->image_convert;
  3584.                 $this->log .= '- new file name ext : ' . $this->image_convert . '<br />';
  3585.             }
  3586.             if (!is_null($this->file_new_name_body)) { // rename file body
  3587.                 $this->file_dst_name_body = $this->file_new_name_body;
  3588.                 $this->log .= '- new file name body : ' . $this->file_new_name_body . '<br />';
  3589.             }
  3590.             if (!is_null($this->file_new_name_ext)) { // rename file ext
  3591.                 $this->file_dst_name_ext  = $this->file_new_name_ext;
  3592.                 $this->log .= '- new file name ext : ' . $this->file_new_name_ext . '<br />';
  3593.             }
  3594.             if (!is_null($this->file_name_body_add)) { // append a string to the name
  3595.                 $this->file_dst_name_body  = $this->file_dst_name_body . $this->file_name_body_add;
  3596.                 $this->log .= '- file name body append : ' . $this->file_name_body_add . '<br />';
  3597.             }
  3598.             if (!is_null($this->file_name_body_pre)) { // prepend a string to the name
  3599.                 $this->file_dst_name_body  = $this->file_name_body_pre . $this->file_dst_name_body;
  3600.                 $this->log .= '- file name body prepend : ' . $this->file_name_body_pre . '<br />';
  3601.             }
  3602.             if ($this->file_safe_name) { // formats the name
  3603.                 $this->file_dst_name_body = utf8_encode(strtr(utf8_decode($this->file_dst_name_body), utf8_decode('ŠŽšžŸÀÁÂÃÄÅÇÈÉÊËÌÍÎÏÑÒÓÔÕÖØÙÚÛÜÝàáâãäåçèéêëìíîïñòóôõöøùúûüýÿ'), 'SZszYAAAAAACEEEEIIIINOOOOOOUUUUYaaaaaaceeeeiiiinoooooouuuuyy'));
  3604.                 $this->file_dst_name_body = strtr($this->file_dst_name_body, array('Þ' => 'TH', 'þ' => 'th', 'Ð' => 'DH', 'ð' => 'dh', 'ß' => 'ss', 'Œ' => 'OE', 'œ' => 'oe', 'Æ' => 'AE', 'æ' => 'ae', 'µ' => 'u'));
  3605.                 $this->file_dst_name_body = preg_replace(array('/\s/', '/\.[\.]+/', '/[^\w_\.\-]/'), array('_', '.', ''), $this->file_dst_name_body);
  3606.                 $this->log .= '- file name safe format<br />';
  3607.             }
  3608.  
  3609.             $this->log .= '- destination variables<br />';
  3610.             if (empty($this->file_dst_path) || is_null($this->file_dst_path)) {
  3611.                 $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;file_dst_path         : n/a<br />';
  3612.             } else {
  3613.                 $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;file_dst_path         : ' . $this->file_dst_path . '<br />';
  3614.             }
  3615.             $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;file_dst_name_body    : ' . $this->file_dst_name_body . '<br />';
  3616.             $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;file_dst_name_ext     : ' . $this->file_dst_name_ext . '<br />';
  3617.  
  3618.             // do we do some image manipulation?
  3619.             $image_manipulation  = ($this->file_is_image && (
  3620.                                     $this->image_resize
  3621.                                  || $this->image_convert != ''
  3622.                                  || is_numeric($this->image_brightness)
  3623.                                  || is_numeric($this->image_contrast)
  3624.                                  || is_numeric($this->image_opacity)
  3625.                                  || is_numeric($this->image_threshold)
  3626.                                  || !empty($this->image_tint_color)
  3627.                                  || !empty($this->image_overlay_color)
  3628.                                  || $this->image_pixelate
  3629.                                  || $this->image_unsharp
  3630.                                  || !empty($this->image_text)
  3631.                                  || $this->image_greyscale
  3632.                                  || $this->image_negative
  3633.                                  || !empty($this->image_watermark)
  3634.                                  || is_numeric($this->image_rotate)
  3635.                                  || is_numeric($this->jpeg_size)
  3636.                                  || !empty($this->image_flip)
  3637.                                  || !empty($this->image_crop)
  3638.                                  || !empty($this->image_precrop)
  3639.                                  || !empty($this->image_border)
  3640.                                  || !empty($this->image_border_transparent)
  3641.                                  || $this->image_frame > 0
  3642.                                  || $this->image_bevel > 0
  3643.                                  || $this->image_reflection_height));
  3644.  
  3645.             // set the destination file name
  3646.             $this->file_dst_name = $this->file_dst_name_body . (!empty($this->file_dst_name_ext) ? '.' . $this->file_dst_name_ext : '');
  3647.  
  3648.             if (!$return_mode) {
  3649.                 if (!$this->file_auto_rename) {
  3650.                     $this->log .= '- no auto_rename if same filename exists<br />';
  3651.                     $this->file_dst_pathname = $this->file_dst_path . $this->file_dst_name;
  3652.                 } else {
  3653.                     $this->log .= '- checking for auto_rename<br />';
  3654.                     $this->file_dst_pathname = $this->file_dst_path . $this->file_dst_name;
  3655.                     $body = $this->file_dst_name_body;
  3656.                     $ext = '';
  3657.                     // if we have changed the extension, then we add our increment before
  3658.                     if ($file_src_name_ext != $this->file_src_name_ext) {
  3659.                         if (substr($this->file_dst_name_body, -1 - strlen($this->file_src_name_ext)) == '.' . $this->file_src_name_ext) {
  3660.                             $body = substr($this->file_dst_name_body, 0, strlen($this->file_dst_name_body) - 1 - strlen($this->file_src_name_ext));
  3661.                             $ext = '.' . $this->file_src_name_ext;
  3662.                         }
  3663.                     }
  3664.                     $cpt = 1;
  3665.                     while (@file_exists($this->file_dst_pathname)) {
  3666.                         $this->file_dst_name_body = $body . '_' . $cpt . $ext;
  3667.                         $this->file_dst_name = $this->file_dst_name_body . (!empty($this->file_dst_name_ext) ? '.' . $this->file_dst_name_ext : '');
  3668.                         $cpt++;
  3669.                         $this->file_dst_pathname = $this->file_dst_path . $this->file_dst_name;
  3670.                     }
  3671.                     if ($cpt>1) $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;auto_rename to ' . $this->file_dst_name . '<br />';
  3672.                 }
  3673.  
  3674.                 $this->log .= '- destination file details<br />';
  3675.                 $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;file_dst_name         : ' . $this->file_dst_name . '<br />';
  3676.                 $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;file_dst_pathname     : ' . $this->file_dst_pathname . '<br />';
  3677.  
  3678.                 if ($this->file_overwrite) {
  3679.                      $this->log .= '- no overwrite checking<br />';
  3680.                 } else {
  3681.                     if (@file_exists($this->file_dst_pathname)) {
  3682.                         $this->processed = false;
  3683.                         $this->error = $this->translate('already_exists', array($this->file_dst_name));
  3684.                     } else {
  3685.                         $this->log .= '- ' . $this->file_dst_name . ' doesn\'t exist already<br />';
  3686.                     }
  3687.                 }
  3688.             }
  3689.         }
  3690.  
  3691.         if ($this->processed) {
  3692.             // if we have already moved the uploaded file, we use the temporary copy as source file, and check if it exists
  3693.             if (!empty($this->file_src_temp)) {
  3694.                 $this->log .= '- use the temp file instead of the original file since it is a second process<br />';
  3695.                 $this->file_src_pathname   = $this->file_src_temp;
  3696.                 if (!file_exists($this->file_src_pathname)) {
  3697.                     $this->processed = false;
  3698.                     $this->error = $this->translate('temp_file_missing');
  3699.                 }
  3700.             // if we haven't a temp file, and that we do check on uploads, we use is_uploaded_file()
  3701.             } else if (!$this->no_upload_check) {
  3702.                 if (!is_uploaded_file($this->file_src_pathname)) {
  3703.                     $this->processed = false;
  3704.                     $this->error = $this->translate('source_missing');
  3705.                 }
  3706.             // otherwise, if we don't check on uploaded files (local file for instance), we use file_exists()
  3707.             } else {
  3708.                 if (!file_exists($this->file_src_pathname)) {
  3709.                     $this->processed = false;
  3710.                     $this->error = $this->translate('source_missing');
  3711.                 }
  3712.             }
  3713.  
  3714.             // checks if the destination directory exists, and attempt to create it
  3715.             if (!$return_mode) {
  3716.                 if ($this->processed && !file_exists($this->file_dst_path)) {
  3717.                     if ($this->dir_auto_create) {
  3718.                         $this->log .= '- ' . $this->file_dst_path . ' doesn\'t exist. Attempting creation:';
  3719.                         if (!$this->rmkdir($this->file_dst_path, $this->dir_chmod)) {
  3720.                             $this->log .= ' failed<br />';
  3721.                             $this->processed = false;
  3722.                             $this->error = $this->translate('destination_dir');
  3723.                         } else {
  3724.                             $this->log .= ' success<br />';
  3725.                         }
  3726.                     } else {
  3727.                         $this->error = $this->translate('destination_dir_missing');
  3728.                     }
  3729.                 }
  3730.  
  3731.                 if ($this->processed && !is_dir($this->file_dst_path)) {
  3732.                     $this->processed = false;
  3733.                     $this->error = $this->translate('destination_path_not_dir');
  3734.                 }
  3735.  
  3736.                 // checks if the destination directory is writeable, and attempt to make it writeable
  3737.                 $hash = md5($this->file_dst_name_body . rand(1, 1000));
  3738.                 if ($this->processed && !($f = @fopen($this->file_dst_path . $hash . (!empty($this->file_dst_name_ext) ? '.' . $this->file_dst_name_ext : ''), 'a+'))) {
  3739.                     if ($this->dir_auto_chmod) {
  3740.                         $this->log .= '- ' . $this->file_dst_path . ' is not writeable. Attempting chmod:';
  3741.                         if (!@chmod($this->file_dst_path, $this->dir_chmod)) {
  3742.                             $this->log .= ' failed<br />';
  3743.                             $this->processed = false;
  3744.                             $this->error = $this->translate('destination_dir_write');
  3745.                         } else {
  3746.                             $this->log .= ' success<br />';
  3747.                             if (!($f = @fopen($this->file_dst_path . $hash . (!empty($this->file_dst_name_ext) ? '.' . $this->file_dst_name_ext : ''), 'a+'))) { // we re-check
  3748.                                 $this->processed = false;
  3749.                                 $this->error = $this->translate('destination_dir_write');
  3750.                             } else {
  3751.                                 @fclose($f);
  3752.                             }
  3753.                         }
  3754.                     } else {
  3755.                         $this->processed = false;
  3756.                         $this->error = $this->translate('destination_path_write');
  3757.                     }
  3758.                 } else {
  3759.                     if ($this->processed) @fclose($f);
  3760.                     @unlink($this->file_dst_path . $hash . (!empty($this->file_dst_name_ext) ? '.' . $this->file_dst_name_ext : ''));
  3761.                 }
  3762.  
  3763.  
  3764.                 // if we have an uploaded file, and if it is the first process, and if we can't access the file directly (open_basedir restriction)
  3765.                 // then we create a temp file that will be used as the source file in subsequent processes
  3766.                 // the third condition is there to check if the file is not accessible *directly* (it already has positively gone through is_uploaded_file(), so it exists)
  3767.                 if (!$this->no_upload_check && empty($this->file_src_temp) && !@file_exists($this->file_src_pathname)) {
  3768.                     $this->log .= '- attempting to use a temp file:';
  3769.                     $hash = md5($this->file_dst_name_body . rand(1, 1000));
  3770.                     if (move_uploaded_file($this->file_src_pathname, $this->file_dst_path . $hash . (!empty($this->file_dst_name_ext) ? '.' . $this->file_dst_name_ext : ''))) {
  3771.                         $this->file_src_pathname = $this->file_dst_path . $hash . (!empty($this->file_dst_name_ext) ? '.' . $this->file_dst_name_ext : '');
  3772.                         $this->file_src_temp = $this->file_src_pathname;
  3773.                         $this->log .= ' file created<br />';
  3774.                         $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;temp file is: ' . $this->file_src_temp . '<br />';
  3775.                     } else {
  3776.                         $this->log .= ' failed<br />';
  3777.                         $this->processed = false;
  3778.                         $this->error = $this->translate('temp_file');
  3779.                     }
  3780.                 }
  3781.             }
  3782.         }
  3783.  
  3784.         if ($this->processed) {
  3785.  
  3786.             // we do a quick check to ensure the file is really an image
  3787.             // we can do this only now, as it would have failed before in case of open_basedir
  3788.             if ($image_manipulation && !@getimagesize($this->file_src_pathname)) {
  3789.                 $this->log .= '- the file is not an image!<br />';
  3790.                 $image_manipulation = false;
  3791.             }
  3792.  
  3793.             if ($image_manipulation) {
  3794.  
  3795.                 // make sure GD doesn't complain too much
  3796.                 ini_set("gd.jpeg_ignore_warning", 1);
  3797.  
  3798.                 // checks if the source file is readable
  3799.                 if ($this->processed && !($f = @fopen($this->file_src_pathname, 'r'))) {
  3800.                     $this->processed = false;
  3801.                     $this->error = $this->translate('source_not_readable');
  3802.                 } else {
  3803.                     @fclose($f);
  3804.                 }
  3805.  
  3806.                 // we now do all the image manipulations
  3807.                 $this->log .= '- image resizing or conversion wanted<br />';
  3808.                 if ($this->gdversion()) {
  3809.                     switch($this->image_src_type) {
  3810.                         case 'jpg':
  3811.                             if (!function_exists('imagecreatefromjpeg')) {
  3812.                                 $this->processed = false;
  3813.                                 $this->error = $this->translate('no_create_support', array('JPEG'));
  3814.                             } else {
  3815.                                 $image_src = @imagecreatefromjpeg($this->file_src_pathname);
  3816.                                 if (!$image_src) {
  3817.                                     $this->processed = false;
  3818.                                     $this->error = $this->translate('create_error', array('JPEG'));
  3819.                                 } else {
  3820.                                     $this->log .= '- source image is JPEG<br />';
  3821.                                 }
  3822.                             }
  3823.                             break;
  3824.                         case 'png':
  3825.                             if (!function_exists('imagecreatefrompng')) {
  3826.                                 $this->processed = false;
  3827.                                 $this->error = $this->translate('no_create_support', array('PNG'));
  3828.                             } else {
  3829.                                 $image_src = @imagecreatefrompng($this->file_src_pathname);
  3830.                                 if (!$image_src) {
  3831.                                     $this->processed = false;
  3832.                                     $this->error = $this->translate('create_error', array('PNG'));
  3833.                                 } else {
  3834.                                     $this->log .= '- source image is PNG<br />';
  3835.                                 }
  3836.                             }
  3837.                             break;
  3838.                         case 'gif':
  3839.                             if (!function_exists('imagecreatefromgif')) {
  3840.                                 $this->processed = false;
  3841.                                 $this->error = $this->translate('no_create_support', array('GIF'));
  3842.                             } else {
  3843.                                 $image_src = @imagecreatefromgif($this->file_src_pathname);
  3844.                                 if (!$image_src) {
  3845.                                     $this->processed = false;
  3846.                                     $this->error = $this->translate('create_error', array('GIF'));
  3847.                                 } else {
  3848.                                     $this->log .= '- source image is GIF<br />';
  3849.                                 }
  3850.                             }
  3851.                             break;
  3852.                         case 'bmp':
  3853.                             if (!method_exists($this, 'imagecreatefrombmp')) {
  3854.                                 $this->processed = false;
  3855.                                 $this->error = $this->translate('no_create_support', array('BMP'));
  3856.                             } else {
  3857.                                 $image_src = @$this->imagecreatefrombmp($this->file_src_pathname);
  3858.                                 if (!$image_src) {
  3859.                                     $this->processed = false;
  3860.                                     $this->error = $this->translate('create_error', array('BMP'));
  3861.                                 } else {
  3862.                                     $this->log .= '- source image is BMP<br />';
  3863.                                 }
  3864.                             }
  3865.                             break;
  3866.                         default:
  3867.                             $this->processed = false;
  3868.                             $this->error = $this->translate('source_invalid');
  3869.                     }
  3870.                 } else {
  3871.                     $this->processed = false;
  3872.                     $this->error = $this->translate('gd_missing');
  3873.                 }
  3874.  
  3875.                 if ($this->processed && $image_src) {
  3876.  
  3877.                     // we have to set image_convert if it is not already
  3878.                     if (empty($this->image_convert)) {
  3879.                         $this->log .= '- setting destination file type to ' . $this->image_src_type . '<br />';
  3880.                         $this->image_convert = $this->image_src_type;
  3881.                     }
  3882.  
  3883.                     if (!in_array($this->image_convert, $this->image_supported)) {
  3884.                         $this->image_convert = 'jpg';
  3885.                     }
  3886.  
  3887.                     // we set the default color to be the background color if we don't output in a transparent format
  3888.                     if ($this->image_convert != 'png' && $this->image_convert != 'gif' && !empty($this->image_default_color) && empty($this->image_background_color)) $this->image_background_color = $this->image_default_color;
  3889.                     if (!empty($this->image_background_color)) $this->image_default_color = $this->image_background_color;
  3890.                     if (empty($this->image_default_color)) $this->image_default_color = '#FFFFFF';
  3891.  
  3892.                     $this->image_src_x = imagesx($image_src);
  3893.                     $this->image_src_y = imagesy($image_src);
  3894.                     $gd_version = $this->gdversion();
  3895.                     $ratio_crop = null;
  3896.  
  3897.                     if (!imageistruecolor($image_src)) {  // $this->image_src_type == 'gif'
  3898.                         $this->log .= '- image is detected as having a palette<br />';
  3899.                         $this->image_is_palette = true;
  3900.                         $this->image_transparent_color = imagecolortransparent($image_src);
  3901.                         if ($this->image_transparent_color >= 0 && imagecolorstotal($image_src) > $this->image_transparent_color) {
  3902.                             $this->image_is_transparent = true;
  3903.                             $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;palette image is detected as transparent<br />';
  3904.                         }
  3905.                         // if the image has a palette (GIF), we convert it to true color, preserving transparency
  3906.                         $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;convert palette image to true color<br />';
  3907.                         $true_color = imagecreatetruecolor($this->image_src_x, $this->image_src_y);
  3908.                         imagealphablending($true_color, false);
  3909.                         imagesavealpha($true_color, true);
  3910.                         for ($x = 0; $x < $this->image_src_x; $x++) {
  3911.                             for ($y = 0; $y < $this->image_src_y; $y++) {
  3912.                                 if ($this->image_transparent_color >= 0 && imagecolorat($image_src, $x, $y) == $this->image_transparent_color) {
  3913.                                     imagesetpixel($true_color, $x, $y, 127 << 24);
  3914.                                 } else {
  3915.                                     $rgb = imagecolorsforindex($image_src, imagecolorat($image_src, $x, $y));
  3916.                                     imagesetpixel($true_color, $x, $y, ($rgb['alpha'] << 24) | ($rgb['red'] << 16) | ($rgb['green'] << 8) | $rgb['blue']);
  3917.                                 }
  3918.                             }
  3919.                         }
  3920.                         $image_src = $this->imagetransfer($true_color, $image_src);
  3921.                         imagealphablending($image_src, false);
  3922.                         imagesavealpha($image_src, true);
  3923.                         $this->image_is_palette = false;
  3924.                     }
  3925.  
  3926.  
  3927.                     $image_dst = & $image_src;
  3928.  
  3929.                     // pre-crop image, before resizing
  3930.                     if ((!empty($this->image_precrop))) {
  3931.                         list($ct, $cr, $cb, $cl) = $this->getoffsets($this->image_precrop, $this->image_src_x, $this->image_src_y, true, true);
  3932.                         $this->log .= '- pre-crop image : ' . $ct . ' ' . $cr . ' ' . $cb . ' ' . $cl . ' <br />';
  3933.                         $this->image_src_x = $this->image_src_x - $cl - $cr;
  3934.                         $this->image_src_y = $this->image_src_y - $ct - $cb;
  3935.                         if ($this->image_src_x < 1) $this->image_src_x = 1;
  3936.                         if ($this->image_src_y < 1) $this->image_src_y = 1;
  3937.                         $tmp = $this->imagecreatenew($this->image_src_x, $this->image_src_y);
  3938.  
  3939.                         // we copy the image into the recieving image
  3940.                         imagecopy($tmp, $image_dst, 0, 0, $cl, $ct, $this->image_src_x, $this->image_src_y);
  3941.  
  3942.                         // if we crop with negative margins, we have to make sure the extra bits are the right color, or transparent
  3943.                         if ($ct < 0 || $cr < 0 || $cb < 0 || $cl < 0 ) {
  3944.                             // use the background color if present
  3945.                             if (!empty($this->image_background_color)) {
  3946.                                 list($red, $green, $blue) = $this->getcolors($this->image_background_color);
  3947.                                 $fill = imagecolorallocate($tmp, $red, $green, $blue);
  3948.                             } else {
  3949.                                 $fill = imagecolorallocatealpha($tmp, 0, 0, 0, 127);
  3950.                             }
  3951.                             // fills eventual negative margins
  3952.                             if ($ct < 0) imagefilledrectangle($tmp, 0, 0, $this->image_src_x, -$ct, $fill);
  3953.                             if ($cr < 0) imagefilledrectangle($tmp, $this->image_src_x + $cr, 0, $this->image_src_x, $this->image_src_y, $fill);
  3954.                             if ($cb < 0) imagefilledrectangle($tmp, 0, $this->image_src_y + $cb, $this->image_src_x, $this->image_src_y, $fill);
  3955.                             if ($cl < 0) imagefilledrectangle($tmp, 0, 0, -$cl, $this->image_src_y, $fill);
  3956.                         }
  3957.  
  3958.                         // we transfert tmp into image_dst
  3959.                         $image_dst = $this->imagetransfer($tmp, $image_dst);
  3960.                     }
  3961.  
  3962.                     // resize image (and move image_src_x, image_src_y dimensions into image_dst_x, image_dst_y)
  3963.                     if ($this->image_resize) {
  3964.                         $this->log .= '- resizing...<br />';
  3965.  
  3966.                         if ($this->image_ratio_x) {
  3967.                             $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;calculate x size<br />';
  3968.                             $this->image_dst_x = round(($this->image_src_x * $this->image_y) / $this->image_src_y);
  3969.                             $this->image_dst_y = $this->image_y;
  3970.                         } else if ($this->image_ratio_y) {
  3971.                             $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;calculate y size<br />';
  3972.                             $this->image_dst_x = $this->image_x;
  3973.                             $this->image_dst_y = round(($this->image_src_y * $this->image_x) / $this->image_src_x);
  3974.                         } else if (is_numeric($this->image_ratio_pixels)) {
  3975.                             $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;calculate x/y size to match a number of pixels<br />';
  3976.                             $pixels = $this->image_src_y * $this->image_src_x;
  3977.                             $diff = sqrt($this->image_ratio_pixels / $pixels);
  3978.                             $this->image_dst_x = round($this->image_src_x * $diff);
  3979.                             $this->image_dst_y = round($this->image_src_y * $diff);
  3980.                         } else if ($this->image_ratio || $this->image_ratio_crop || $this->image_ratio_fill || $this->image_ratio_no_zoom_in || $this->image_ratio_no_zoom_out) {
  3981.                             $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;check x/y sizes<br />';
  3982.                             if ((!$this->image_ratio_no_zoom_in && !$this->image_ratio_no_zoom_out)
  3983.                                  || ($this->image_ratio_no_zoom_in && ($this->image_src_x > $this->image_x || $this->image_src_y > $this->image_y))
  3984.                                  || ($this->image_ratio_no_zoom_out && $this->image_src_x < $this->image_x && $this->image_src_y < $this->image_y)) {
  3985.                                 $this->image_dst_x = $this->image_x;
  3986.                                 $this->image_dst_y = $this->image_y;
  3987.                                 if ($this->image_ratio_crop) {
  3988.                                     if (!is_string($this->image_ratio_crop)) $this->image_ratio_crop = '';
  3989.                                     $this->image_ratio_crop = strtolower($this->image_ratio_crop);
  3990.                                     if (($this->image_src_x/$this->image_x) > ($this->image_src_y/$this->image_y)) {
  3991.                                         $this->image_dst_y = $this->image_y;
  3992.                                         $this->image_dst_x = intval($this->image_src_x*($this->image_y / $this->image_src_y));
  3993.                                         $ratio_crop = array();
  3994.                                         $ratio_crop['x'] = $this->image_dst_x - $this->image_x;
  3995.                                         if (strpos($this->image_ratio_crop, 'l') !== false) {
  3996.                                             $ratio_crop['l'] = 0;
  3997.                                             $ratio_crop['r'] = $ratio_crop['x'];
  3998.                                         } else if (strpos($this->image_ratio_crop, 'r') !== false) {
  3999.                                             $ratio_crop['l'] = $ratio_crop['x'];
  4000.                                             $ratio_crop['r'] = 0;
  4001.                                         } else {
  4002.                                             $ratio_crop['l'] = round($ratio_crop['x']/2);
  4003.                                             $ratio_crop['r'] = $ratio_crop['x'] - $ratio_crop['l'];
  4004.                                         }
  4005.                                         $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ratio_crop_x         : ' . $ratio_crop['x'] . ' (' . $ratio_crop['l'] . ';' . $ratio_crop['r'] . ')<br />';
  4006.                                         if (is_null($this->image_crop)) $this->image_crop = array(0, 0, 0, 0);
  4007.                                     } else {
  4008.                                         $this->image_dst_x = $this->image_x;
  4009.                                         $this->image_dst_y = intval($this->image_src_y*($this->image_x / $this->image_src_x));
  4010.                                         $ratio_crop = array();
  4011.                                         $ratio_crop['y'] = $this->image_dst_y - $this->image_y;
  4012.                                         if (strpos($this->image_ratio_crop, 't') !== false) {
  4013.                                             $ratio_crop['t'] = 0;
  4014.                                             $ratio_crop['b'] = $ratio_crop['y'];
  4015.                                         } else if (strpos($this->image_ratio_crop, 'b') !== false) {
  4016.                                             $ratio_crop['t'] = $ratio_crop['y'];
  4017.                                             $ratio_crop['b'] = 0;
  4018.                                         } else {
  4019.                                             $ratio_crop['t'] = round($ratio_crop['y']/2);
  4020.                                             $ratio_crop['b'] = $ratio_crop['y'] - $ratio_crop['t'];
  4021.                                         }
  4022.                                         $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ratio_crop_y         : ' . $ratio_crop['y'] . ' (' . $ratio_crop['t'] . ';' . $ratio_crop['b'] . ')<br />';
  4023.                                         if (is_null($this->image_crop)) $this->image_crop = array(0, 0, 0, 0);
  4024.                                     }
  4025.                                 } else if ($this->image_ratio_fill) {
  4026.                                     if (!is_string($this->image_ratio_fill)) $this->image_ratio_fill = '';
  4027.                                     $this->image_ratio_fill = strtolower($this->image_ratio_fill);
  4028.                                     if (($this->image_src_x/$this->image_x) < ($this->image_src_y/$this->image_y)) {
  4029.                                         $this->image_dst_y = $this->image_y;
  4030.                                         $this->image_dst_x = intval($this->image_src_x*($this->image_y / $this->image_src_y));
  4031.                                         $ratio_crop = array();
  4032.                                         $ratio_crop['x'] = $this->image_dst_x - $this->image_x;
  4033.                                         if (strpos($this->image_ratio_fill, 'l') !== false) {
  4034.                                             $ratio_crop['l'] = 0;
  4035.                                             $ratio_crop['r'] = $ratio_crop['x'];
  4036.                                         } else if (strpos($this->image_ratio_fill, 'r') !== false) {
  4037.                                             $ratio_crop['l'] = $ratio_crop['x'];
  4038.                                             $ratio_crop['r'] = 0;
  4039.                                         } else {
  4040.                                             $ratio_crop['l'] = round($ratio_crop['x']/2);
  4041.                                             $ratio_crop['r'] = $ratio_crop['x'] - $ratio_crop['l'];
  4042.                                         }
  4043.                                         $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ratio_fill_x         : ' . $ratio_crop['x'] . ' (' . $ratio_crop['l'] . ';' . $ratio_crop['r'] . ')<br />';
  4044.                                         if (is_null($this->image_crop)) $this->image_crop = array(0, 0, 0, 0);
  4045.                                     } else {
  4046.                                         $this->image_dst_x = $this->image_x;
  4047.                                         $this->image_dst_y = intval($this->image_src_y*($this->image_x / $this->image_src_x));
  4048.                                         $ratio_crop = array();
  4049.                                         $ratio_crop['y'] = $this->image_dst_y - $this->image_y;
  4050.                                         if (strpos($this->image_ratio_fill, 't') !== false) {
  4051.                                             $ratio_crop['t'] = 0;
  4052.                                             $ratio_crop['b'] = $ratio_crop['y'];
  4053.                                         } else if (strpos($this->image_ratio_fill, 'b') !== false) {
  4054.                                             $ratio_crop['t'] = $ratio_crop['y'];
  4055.                                             $ratio_crop['b'] = 0;
  4056.                                         } else {
  4057.                                             $ratio_crop['t'] = round($ratio_crop['y']/2);
  4058.                                             $ratio_crop['b'] = $ratio_crop['y'] - $ratio_crop['t'];
  4059.                                         }
  4060.                                         $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ratio_fill_y         : ' . $ratio_crop['y'] . ' (' . $ratio_crop['t'] . ';' . $ratio_crop['b'] . ')<br />';
  4061.                                         if (is_null($this->image_crop)) $this->image_crop = array(0, 0, 0, 0);
  4062.                                     }
  4063.                                 } else {
  4064.                                     if (($this->image_src_x/$this->image_x) > ($this->image_src_y/$this->image_y)) {
  4065.                                         $this->image_dst_x = $this->image_x;
  4066.                                         $this->image_dst_y = intval($this->image_src_y*($this->image_x / $this->image_src_x));
  4067.                                     } else {
  4068.                                         $this->image_dst_y = $this->image_y;
  4069.                                         $this->image_dst_x = intval($this->image_src_x*($this->image_y / $this->image_src_y));
  4070.                                     }
  4071.                                 }
  4072.                             } else {
  4073.                                 $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;doesn\'t calculate x/y sizes<br />';
  4074.                                 $this->image_dst_x = $this->image_src_x;
  4075.                                 $this->image_dst_y = $this->image_src_y;
  4076.                             }
  4077.                         } else {
  4078.                             $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;use plain sizes<br />';
  4079.                             $this->image_dst_x = $this->image_x;
  4080.                             $this->image_dst_y = $this->image_y;
  4081.                         }
  4082.  
  4083.                         if ($this->image_dst_x < 1) $this->image_dst_x = 1;
  4084.                         if ($this->image_dst_y < 1) $this->image_dst_y = 1;
  4085.                         $tmp = $this->imagecreatenew($this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y);
  4086.  
  4087.                         if ($gd_version >= 2) {
  4088.                             $res = imagecopyresampled($tmp, $image_src, 0, 0, 0, 0, $this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y, $this->image_src_x, $this->image_src_y);
  4089.                         } else {
  4090.                             $res = imagecopyresized($tmp, $image_src, 0, 0, 0, 0, $this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y, $this->image_src_x, $this->image_src_y);
  4091.                         }
  4092.  
  4093.                         $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;resized image object created<br />';
  4094.                         $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;image_src_x y        : ' . $this->image_src_x . ' x ' . $this->image_src_y . '<br />';
  4095.                         $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;image_dst_x y        : ' . $this->image_dst_x . ' x ' . $this->image_dst_y . '<br />';
  4096.                         // we transfert tmp into image_dst
  4097.                         $image_dst = $this->imagetransfer($tmp, $image_dst);
  4098.  
  4099.                     } else {
  4100.                         $this->image_dst_x = $this->image_src_x;
  4101.                         $this->image_dst_y = $this->image_src_y;
  4102.                     }
  4103.  
  4104.                     // crop image (and also crops if image_ratio_crop is used)
  4105.                     if ((!empty($this->image_crop) || !is_null($ratio_crop))) {
  4106.                         list($ct, $cr, $cb, $cl) = $this->getoffsets($this->image_crop, $this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y, true, true);
  4107.                         // we adjust the cropping if we use image_ratio_crop
  4108.                         if (!is_null($ratio_crop)) {
  4109.                             if (array_key_exists('t', $ratio_crop)) $ct += $ratio_crop['t'];
  4110.                             if (array_key_exists('r', $ratio_crop)) $cr += $ratio_crop['r'];
  4111.                             if (array_key_exists('b', $ratio_crop)) $cb += $ratio_crop['b'];
  4112.                             if (array_key_exists('l', $ratio_crop)) $cl += $ratio_crop['l'];
  4113.                         }
  4114.                         $this->log .= '- crop image : ' . $ct . ' ' . $cr . ' ' . $cb . ' ' . $cl . ' <br />';
  4115.                         $this->image_dst_x = $this->image_dst_x - $cl - $cr;
  4116.                         $this->image_dst_y = $this->image_dst_y - $ct - $cb;
  4117.                         if ($this->image_dst_x < 1) $this->image_dst_x = 1;
  4118.                         if ($this->image_dst_y < 1) $this->image_dst_y = 1;
  4119.                         $tmp = $this->imagecreatenew($this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y);
  4120.  
  4121.                         // we copy the image into the recieving image
  4122.                         imagecopy($tmp, $image_dst, 0, 0, $cl, $ct, $this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y);
  4123.  
  4124.                         // if we crop with negative margins, we have to make sure the extra bits are the right color, or transparent
  4125.                         if ($ct < 0 || $cr < 0 || $cb < 0 || $cl < 0 ) {
  4126.                             // use the background color if present
  4127.                             if (!empty($this->image_background_color)) {
  4128.                                 list($red, $green, $blue) = $this->getcolors($this->image_background_color);
  4129.                                 $fill = imagecolorallocate($tmp, $red, $green, $blue);
  4130.                             } else {
  4131.                                 $fill = imagecolorallocatealpha($tmp, 0, 0, 0, 127);
  4132.                             }
  4133.                             // fills eventual negative margins
  4134.                             if ($ct < 0) imagefilledrectangle($tmp, 0, 0, $this->image_dst_x, -$ct-1, $fill);
  4135.                             if ($cr < 0) imagefilledrectangle($tmp, $this->image_dst_x + $cr, 0, $this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y, $fill);
  4136.                             if ($cb < 0) imagefilledrectangle($tmp, 0, $this->image_dst_y + $cb, $this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y, $fill);
  4137.                             if ($cl < 0) imagefilledrectangle($tmp, 0, 0, -$cl-1, $this->image_dst_y, $fill);
  4138.                         }
  4139.  
  4140.                         // we transfert tmp into image_dst
  4141.                         $image_dst = $this->imagetransfer($tmp, $image_dst);
  4142.                     }
  4143.  
  4144.                     // flip image
  4145.                     if ($gd_version >= 2 && !empty($this->image_flip)) {
  4146.                         $this->image_flip = strtolower($this->image_flip);
  4147.                         $this->log .= '- flip image : ' . $this->image_flip . '<br />';
  4148.                         $tmp = $this->imagecreatenew($this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y);
  4149.                         for ($x = 0; $x < $this->image_dst_x; $x++) {
  4150.                             for ($y = 0; $y < $this->image_dst_y; $y++){
  4151.                                 if (strpos($this->image_flip, 'v') !== false) {
  4152.                                     imagecopy($tmp, $image_dst, $this->image_dst_x - $x - 1, $y, $x, $y, 1, 1);
  4153.                                 } else {
  4154.                                     imagecopy($tmp, $image_dst, $x, $this->image_dst_y - $y - 1, $x, $y, 1, 1);
  4155.                                 }
  4156.                             }
  4157.                         }
  4158.                         // we transfert tmp into image_dst
  4159.                         $image_dst = $this->imagetransfer($tmp, $image_dst);
  4160.                     }
  4161.  
  4162.                     // rotate image
