  4163.                     if ($gd_version >= 2 && is_numeric($this->image_rotate)) {
  4164.                         if (!in_array($this->image_rotate, array(0, 90, 180, 270))) $this->image_rotate = 0;
  4165.                         if ($this->image_rotate != 0) {
  4166.                             if ($this->image_rotate == 90 || $this->image_rotate == 270) {
  4167.                                 $tmp = $this->imagecreatenew($this->image_dst_y, $this->image_dst_x);
  4168.                             } else {
  4169.                                 $tmp = $this->imagecreatenew($this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y);
  4170.                             }
  4171.                             $this->log .= '- rotate image : ' . $this->image_rotate . '<br />';
  4172.                             for ($x = 0; $x < $this->image_dst_x; $x++) {
  4173.                                 for ($y = 0; $y < $this->image_dst_y; $y++){
  4174.                                     if ($this->image_rotate == 90) {
  4175.                                         imagecopy($tmp, $image_dst, $y, $x, $x, $this->image_dst_y - $y - 1, 1, 1);
  4176.                                     } else if ($this->image_rotate == 180) {
  4177.                                         imagecopy($tmp, $image_dst, $x, $y, $this->image_dst_x - $x - 1, $this->image_dst_y - $y - 1, 1, 1);
  4178.                                     } else if ($this->image_rotate == 270) {
  4179.                                         imagecopy($tmp, $image_dst, $y, $x, $this->image_dst_x - $x - 1, $y, 1, 1);
  4180.                                     } else {
  4181.                                         imagecopy($tmp, $image_dst, $x, $y, $x, $y, 1, 1);
  4182.                                     }
  4183.                                 }
  4184.                             }
  4185.                             if ($this->image_rotate == 90 || $this->image_rotate == 270) {
  4186.                                 $t = $this->image_dst_y;
  4187.                                 $this->image_dst_y = $this->image_dst_x;
  4188.                                 $this->image_dst_x = $t;
  4189.                             }
  4190.                             // we transfert tmp into image_dst
  4191.                             $image_dst = $this->imagetransfer($tmp, $image_dst);
  4192.                         }
  4193.                     }
  4194.  
  4195.                     // pixelate image
  4196.                     if ((is_numeric($this->image_pixelate) && $this->image_pixelate > 0)) {
  4197.                         $this->log .= '- pixelate image (' . $this->image_pixelate . 'px)<br />';
  4198.                         $filter = $this->imagecreatenew($this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y);
  4199.                         if ($gd_version >= 2) {
  4200.                             imagecopyresampled($filter, $image_dst, 0, 0, 0, 0, round($this->image_dst_x / $this->image_pixelate), round($this->image_dst_y / $this->image_pixelate), $this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y);
  4201.                             imagecopyresampled($image_dst, $filter, 0, 0, 0, 0, $this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y, round($this->image_dst_x / $this->image_pixelate), round($this->image_dst_y / $this->image_pixelate));
  4202.                         } else {
  4203.                             imagecopyresized($filter, $image_dst, 0, 0, 0, 0, round($this->image_dst_x / $this->image_pixelate), round($this->image_dst_y / $this->image_pixelate), $this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y);
  4204.                             imagecopyresized($image_dst, $filter, 0, 0, 0, 0, $this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y, round($this->image_dst_x / $this->image_pixelate), round($this->image_dst_y / $this->image_pixelate));
  4205.                         }
  4206.                         imagedestroy($filter);
  4207.                     }
  4208.  
  4209.                     // unsharp mask
  4210.                     if ($gd_version >= 2 && $this->image_unsharp && is_numeric($this->image_unsharp_amount) && is_numeric($this->image_unsharp_radius) && is_numeric($this->image_unsharp_threshold)) {
  4211.                         // Unsharp Mask for PHP - version 2.1.1
  4212.                         // Unsharp mask algorithm by Torstein Hønsi 2003-07. 
  4213.                         // Used with permission
  4214.                         // Modified to support alpha transparency
  4215.                         if ($this->image_unsharp_amount > 500)    $this->image_unsharp_amount = 500; 
  4216.                         $this->image_unsharp_amount = $this->image_unsharp_amount * 0.016; 
  4217.                         if ($this->image_unsharp_radius > 50)    $this->image_unsharp_radius = 50; 
  4218.                         $this->image_unsharp_radius = $this->image_unsharp_radius * 2; 
  4219.                         if ($this->image_unsharp_threshold > 255)    $this->image_unsharp_threshold = 255; 
  4220.                         $this->image_unsharp_radius = abs(round($this->image_unsharp_radius));
  4221.                         if ($this->image_unsharp_radius != 0) {       
  4222.                             $this->image_dst_x = imagesx($image_dst); $this->image_dst_y = imagesy($image_dst); 
  4223.                             $canvas = $this->imagecreatenew($this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y, false, true); 
  4224.                             $blur = $this->imagecreatenew($this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y, false, true); 
  4225.                             if (function_exists('imageconvolution')) { // PHP >= 5.1  
  4226.                                 $matrix = array(array( 1, 2, 1 ), array( 2, 4, 2 ), array( 1, 2, 1 ));  
  4227.                                 imagecopy($blur, $image_dst, 0, 0, 0, 0, $this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y); 
  4228.                                 imageconvolution($blur, $matrix, 16, 0);  
  4229.                             } else {  
  4230.                                 for ($i = 0; $i < $this->image_unsharp_radius; $i++) { 
  4231.                                     imagecopy($blur, $image_dst, 0, 0, 1, 0, $this->image_dst_x - 1, $this->image_dst_y); // left 
  4232.                                     $this->imagecopymergealpha($blur, $image_dst, 1, 0, 0, 0, $this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y, 50); // right 
  4233.                                     $this->imagecopymergealpha($blur, $image_dst, 0, 0, 0, 0, $this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y, 50); // center 
  4234.                                     imagecopy($canvas, $blur, 0, 0, 0, 0, $this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y); 
  4235.                                     $this->imagecopymergealpha($blur, $canvas, 0, 0, 0, 1, $this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y - 1, 33.33333 ); // up 
  4236.                                     $this->imagecopymergealpha($blur, $canvas, 0, 1, 0, 0, $this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y, 25); // down 
  4237.                                 } 
  4238.                             } 
  4239.                             $p_new = array();
  4240.                             if($this->image_unsharp_threshold>0) { 
  4241.                                 for ($x = 0; $x < $this->image_dst_x-1; $x++) { 
  4242.                                     for ($y = 0; $y < $this->image_dst_y; $y++) {
  4243.                                         $p_orig = imagecolorsforindex($image_dst, imagecolorat($image_dst, $x, $y));
  4244.                                         $p_blur = imagecolorsforindex($blur, imagecolorat($blur, $x, $y));
  4245.                                         $p_new['red'] = (abs($p_orig['red'] - $p_blur['red']) >= $this->image_unsharp_threshold) ? max(0, min(255, ($this->image_unsharp_amount * ($p_orig['red'] - $p_blur['red'])) + $p_orig['red'])) : $p_orig['red']; 
  4246.                                         $p_new['green'] = (abs($p_orig['green'] - $p_blur['green']) >= $this->image_unsharp_threshold) ? max(0, min(255, ($this->image_unsharp_amount * ($p_orig['green'] - $p_blur['green'])) + $p_orig['green'])) : $p_orig['green']; 
  4247.                                         $p_new['blue'] = (abs($p_orig['blue'] - $p_blur['blue']) >= $this->image_unsharp_threshold) ? max(0, min(255, ($this->image_unsharp_amount * ($p_orig['blue'] - $p_blur['blue'])) + $p_orig['blue'])) : $p_orig['blue'];         
  4248.                                         if (($p_orig['red'] != $p_new['red']) || ($p_orig['green'] != $p_new['green']) || ($p_orig['blue'] != $p_new['blue'])) { 
  4249.                                             $color = imagecolorallocatealpha($image_dst, $p_new['red'], $p_new['green'], $p_new['blue'], $p_orig['alpha']);
  4250.                                             imagesetpixel($image_dst, $x, $y, $color);                                            
  4251.                                         } 
  4252.                                     } 
  4253.                                 } 
  4254.                             } else { 
  4255.                                 for ($x = 0; $x < $this->image_dst_x; $x++) {
  4256.                                     for ($y = 0; $y < $this->image_dst_y; $y++) {
  4257.                                         $p_orig = imagecolorsforindex($image_dst, imagecolorat($image_dst, $x, $y));
  4258.                                         $p_blur = imagecolorsforindex($blur, imagecolorat($blur, $x, $y));
  4259.                                         $p_new['red'] = ($this->image_unsharp_amount * ($p_orig['red'] - $p_blur['red'])) + $p_orig['red']; 
  4260.                                         if ($p_new['red']>255) { $p_new['red']=255; } elseif ($p_new['red']<0) { $p_new['red']=0; } 
  4261.                                         $p_new['green'] = ($this->image_unsharp_amount * ($p_orig['green'] - $p_blur['green'])) + $p_orig['green']; 
  4262.                                         if ($p_new['green']>255) { $p_new['green']=255; }  elseif ($p_new['green']<0) { $p_new['green']=0; } 
  4263.                                         $p_new['blue'] = ($this->image_unsharp_amount * ($p_orig['blue'] - $p_blur['blue'])) + $p_orig['blue']; 
  4264.                                         if ($p_new['blue']>255) { $p_new['blue']=255; } elseif ($p_new['blue']<0) { $p_new['blue']=0; } 
  4265.                                         $color = imagecolorallocatealpha($image_dst, $p_new['red'], $p_new['green'], $p_new['blue'], $p_orig['alpha']);
  4266.                                         imagesetpixel($image_dst, $x, $y, $color);                                            
  4267.                                     } 
  4268.                                 } 
  4269.                             } 
  4270.                             imagedestroy($canvas); 
  4271.                             imagedestroy($blur); 
  4272.                         }
  4273.                     }
  4274.  
  4275.                     // add color overlay
  4276.                     if ($gd_version >= 2 && (is_numeric($this->image_overlay_opacity) && $this->image_overlay_opacity > 0 && !empty($this->image_overlay_color))) {
  4277.                         $this->log .= '- apply color overlay<br />';
  4278.                         list($red, $green, $blue) = $this->getcolors($this->image_overlay_color);
  4279.                         $filter = imagecreatetruecolor($this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y);
  4280.                         $color = imagecolorallocate($filter, $red, $green, $blue);
  4281.                         imagefilledrectangle($filter, 0, 0, $this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y, $color);
  4282.                         $this->imagecopymergealpha($image_dst, $filter, 0, 0, 0, 0, $this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y, $this->image_overlay_opacity);
  4283.                         imagedestroy($filter);
  4284.                     }
  4285.  
  4286.                     // add brightness, contrast and tint, turns to greyscale and inverts colors
  4287.                     if ($gd_version >= 2 && ($this->image_negative || $this->image_greyscale || is_numeric($this->image_threshold)|| is_numeric($this->image_brightness) || is_numeric($this->image_contrast) || !empty($this->image_tint_color))) {
  4288.                         $this->log .= '- apply tint, light, contrast correction, negative, greyscale and threshold<br />';
  4289.                         if (!empty($this->image_tint_color)) list($tint_red, $tint_green, $tint_blue) = $this->getcolors($this->image_tint_color);
  4290.                         //imagealphablending($image_dst, true);
  4291.                         for($y=0; $y < $this->image_dst_y; $y++) {
  4292.                             for($x=0; $x < $this->image_dst_x; $x++) {
  4293.                                 if ($this->image_greyscale) {
  4294.                                     $pixel = imagecolorsforindex($image_dst, imagecolorat($image_dst, $x, $y));
  4295.                                     $r = $g = $b = round((0.2125 * $pixel['red']) + (0.7154 * $pixel['green']) + (0.0721 * $pixel['blue']));
  4296.                                     $color = imagecolorallocatealpha($image_dst, $r, $g, $b, $pixel['alpha']);
  4297.                                     imagesetpixel($image_dst, $x, $y, $color);
  4298.                                     unset($color); unset($pixel);
  4299.                                 }
  4300.                                 if (is_numeric($this->image_threshold)) {
  4301.                                     $pixel = imagecolorsforindex($image_dst, imagecolorat($image_dst, $x, $y));
  4302.                                     $c = (round($pixel['red'] + $pixel['green'] + $pixel['blue']) / 3) - 127;
  4303.                                     $r = $g = $b = ($c > $this->image_threshold ? 255 : 0);
  4304.                                     $color = imagecolorallocatealpha($image_dst, $r, $g, $b, $pixel['alpha']);
  4305.                                     imagesetpixel($image_dst, $x, $y, $color);
  4306.                                     unset($color); unset($pixel);
  4307.                                 }
  4308.                                 if (is_numeric($this->image_brightness)) {
  4309.                                     $pixel = imagecolorsforindex($image_dst, imagecolorat($image_dst, $x, $y));
  4310.                                     $r = max(min(round($pixel['red'] + (($this->image_brightness * 2))), 255), 0);
  4311.                                     $g = max(min(round($pixel['green'] + (($this->image_brightness * 2))), 255), 0);
  4312.                                     $b = max(min(round($pixel['blue'] + (($this->image_brightness * 2))), 255), 0);
  4313.                                     $color = imagecolorallocatealpha($image_dst, $r, $g, $b, $pixel['alpha']);
  4314.                                     imagesetpixel($image_dst, $x, $y, $color);
  4315.                                     unset($color); unset($pixel);
  4316.                                 }
  4317.                                 if (is_numeric($this->image_contrast)) {
  4318.                                     $pixel = imagecolorsforindex($image_dst, imagecolorat($image_dst, $x, $y));
  4319.                                     $r = max(min(round(($this->image_contrast + 128) * $pixel['red'] / 128), 255), 0);
  4320.                                     $g = max(min(round(($this->image_contrast + 128) * $pixel['green'] / 128), 255), 0);
  4321.                                     $b = max(min(round(($this->image_contrast + 128) * $pixel['blue'] / 128), 255), 0);
  4322.                                     $color = imagecolorallocatealpha($image_dst, $r, $g, $b, $pixel['alpha']);
  4323.                                     imagesetpixel($image_dst, $x, $y, $color);
  4324.                                     unset($color); unset($pixel);
  4325.                                 }
  4326.                                 if (!empty($this->image_tint_color)) {
  4327.                                     $pixel = imagecolorsforindex($image_dst, imagecolorat($image_dst, $x, $y));
  4328.                                     $r = min(round($tint_red * $pixel['red'] / 169), 255);
  4329.                                     $g = min(round($tint_green * $pixel['green'] / 169), 255);
  4330.                                     $b = min(round($tint_blue * $pixel['blue'] / 169), 255);
  4331.                                     $color = imagecolorallocatealpha($image_dst, $r, $g, $b, $pixel['alpha']);
  4332.                                     imagesetpixel($image_dst, $x, $y, $color);
  4333.                                     unset($color); unset($pixel);
  4334.                                 }
  4335.                                 if (!empty($this->image_negative)) {
  4336.                                     $pixel = imagecolorsforindex($image_dst, imagecolorat($image_dst, $x, $y));
  4337.                                     $r = round(255 - $pixel['red']);
  4338.                                     $g = round(255 - $pixel['green']);
  4339.                                     $b = round(255 - $pixel['blue']);
  4340.                                     $color = imagecolorallocatealpha($image_dst, $r, $g, $b, $pixel['alpha']);
  4341.                                     imagesetpixel($image_dst, $x, $y, $color);
  4342.                                     unset($color); unset($pixel);
  4343.                                 }
  4344.                             }
  4345.                         }
  4346.                     }
  4347.  
  4348.                     // adds a border
  4349.                     if ($gd_version >= 2 && !empty($this->image_border)) {
  4350.                         list($ct, $cr, $cb, $cl) = $this->getoffsets($this->image_border, $this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y, true, false);
  4351.                         $this->log .= '- add border : ' . $ct . ' ' . $cr . ' ' . $cb . ' ' . $cl . '<br />';
  4352.                         $this->image_dst_x = $this->image_dst_x + $cl + $cr;
  4353.                         $this->image_dst_y = $this->image_dst_y + $ct + $cb;
  4354.                         if (!empty($this->image_border_color)) list($red, $green, $blue) = $this->getcolors($this->image_border_color);   
  4355.                         $opacity = (is_numeric($this->image_border_opacity) ? (int) (127 - $this->image_border_opacity / 100 * 127): 0);                       
  4356.                         // we now create an image, that we fill with the border color                                                                           
  4357.                         $tmp = $this->imagecreatenew($this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y);                                                                   
  4358.                         $background = imagecolorallocatealpha($tmp, $red, $green, $blue, $opacity);
  4359.                         imagefilledrectangle($tmp, 0, 0, $this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y, $background);
  4360.                         // we then copy the source image into the new image, without merging so that only the border is actually kept
  4361.                         imagecopy($tmp, $image_dst, $cl, $ct, 0, 0, $this->image_dst_x - $cr - $cl, $this->image_dst_y - $cb - $ct);
  4362.                         // we transfert tmp into image_dst
  4363.                         $image_dst = $this->imagetransfer($tmp, $image_dst);
  4364.                     }
  4365.  
  4366.                     // adds a fading-to-transparent border
  4367.                     if ($gd_version >= 2 && !empty($this->image_border_transparent)) {
  4368.                         list($ct, $cr, $cb, $cl) = $this->getoffsets($this->image_border_transparent, $this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y, true, false);
  4369.                         $this->log .= '- add transparent border : ' . $ct . ' ' . $cr . ' ' . $cb . ' ' . $cl . '<br />';
  4370.                         // we now create an image, that we fill with the border color                                                                           
  4371.                         $tmp = $this->imagecreatenew($this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y);                                                                   
  4372.                         // we then copy the source image into the new image, without the borders
  4373.                         imagecopy($tmp, $image_dst, $cl, $ct, $cl, $ct, $this->image_dst_x - $cr - $cl, $this->image_dst_y - $cb - $ct);
  4374.                         // we now add the top border
  4375.                         $opacity = 100;
  4376.                         for ($y = $ct - 1; $y >= 0; $y--) {
  4377.                             $il = (int) ($ct > 0 ? ($cl * ($y / $ct)) : 0);
  4378.                             $ir = (int) ($ct > 0 ? ($cr * ($y / $ct)) : 0);
  4379.                             for ($x = $il; $x < $this->image_dst_x - $ir; $x++) {
  4380.                                 $pixel = imagecolorsforindex($image_dst, imagecolorat($image_dst, $x, $y));
  4381.                                 $alpha = (1 - ($pixel['alpha'] / 127)) * $opacity / 100;
  4382.                                 if ($alpha > 0) {
  4383.                                     if ($alpha > 1) $alpha = 1;
  4384.                                     $color = imagecolorallocatealpha($tmp, $pixel['red'] , $pixel['green'], $pixel['blue'],  round((1 - $alpha) * 127));
  4385.                                     imagesetpixel($tmp, $x, $y, $color);
  4386.                                 }
  4387.                             }
  4388.                             if ($opacity > 0) $opacity = $opacity - (100 / $ct);
  4389.                         }
  4390.                         // we now add the right border
  4391.                         $opacity = 100;
  4392.                         for ($x = $this->image_dst_x - $cr; $x < $this->image_dst_x; $x++) {
  4393.                             $it = (int) ($cr > 0 ? ($ct * (($this->image_dst_x - $x - 1) / $cr)) : 0);
  4394.                             $ib = (int) ($cr > 0 ? ($cb * (($this->image_dst_x - $x - 1) / $cr)) : 0);
  4395.                             for ($y = $it; $y < $this->image_dst_y - $ib; $y++) {
  4396.                                 $pixel = imagecolorsforindex($image_dst, imagecolorat($image_dst, $x, $y));
  4397.                                 $alpha = (1 - ($pixel['alpha'] / 127)) * $opacity / 100;
  4398.                                 if ($alpha > 0) {
  4399.                                     if ($alpha > 1) $alpha = 1;
  4400.                                     $color = imagecolorallocatealpha($tmp, $pixel['red'] , $pixel['green'], $pixel['blue'],  round((1 - $alpha) * 127));
  4401.                                     imagesetpixel($tmp, $x, $y, $color);
  4402.                                 }
  4403.                             }
  4404.                             if ($opacity > 0) $opacity = $opacity - (100 / $cr);
  4405.                         }
  4406.                         // we now add the bottom border
  4407.                         $opacity = 100;
  4408.                         for ($y = $this->image_dst_y - $cb; $y < $this->image_dst_y; $y++) {
  4409.                             $il = (int) ($cb > 0 ? ($cl * (($this->image_dst_y - $y - 1) / $cb)) : 0);
  4410.                             $ir = (int) ($cb > 0 ? ($cr * (($this->image_dst_y - $y - 1) / $cb)) : 0);
  4411.                             for ($x = $il; $x < $this->image_dst_x - $ir; $x++) {
  4412.                                 $pixel = imagecolorsforindex($image_dst, imagecolorat($image_dst, $x, $y));
  4413.                                 $alpha = (1 - ($pixel['alpha'] / 127)) * $opacity / 100;
  4414.                                 if ($alpha > 0) {
  4415.                                     if ($alpha > 1) $alpha = 1;
  4416.                                     $color = imagecolorallocatealpha($tmp, $pixel['red'] , $pixel['green'], $pixel['blue'],  round((1 - $alpha) * 127));
  4417.                                     imagesetpixel($tmp, $x, $y, $color);
  4418.                                 }
  4419.                             }
  4420.                             if ($opacity > 0) $opacity = $opacity - (100 / $cb);
  4421.                         }
  4422.                         // we now add the left border
  4423.                         $opacity = 100;
  4424.                         for ($x = $cl - 1; $x >= 0; $x--) {
  4425.                             $it = (int) ($cl > 0 ? ($ct * ($x / $cl)) : 0);
  4426.                             $ib = (int) ($cl > 0 ? ($cb * ($x / $cl)) : 0);
  4427.                             for ($y = $it; $y < $this->image_dst_y - $ib; $y++) {
  4428.                                 $pixel = imagecolorsforindex($image_dst, imagecolorat($image_dst, $x, $y));
  4429.                                 $alpha = (1 - ($pixel['alpha'] / 127)) * $opacity / 100;
  4430.                                 if ($alpha > 0) {
  4431.                                     if ($alpha > 1) $alpha = 1;
  4432.                                     $color = imagecolorallocatealpha($tmp, $pixel['red'] , $pixel['green'], $pixel['blue'],  round((1 - $alpha) * 127));
  4433.                                     imagesetpixel($tmp, $x, $y, $color);
  4434.                                 }
  4435.                             }
  4436.                             if ($opacity > 0) $opacity = $opacity - (100 / $cl);
  4437.                         }
  4438.                         // we transfert tmp into image_dst
  4439.                         $image_dst = $this->imagetransfer($tmp, $image_dst);
  4440.                     }
  4441.  
  4442.                     // add frame border
  4443.                     if ($gd_version >= 2 && is_numeric($this->image_frame)) {
  4444.                         if (is_array($this->image_frame_colors)) {
  4445.                             $vars = $this->image_frame_colors;
  4446.                             $this->log .= '- add frame : ' . implode(' ', $this->image_frame_colors) . '<br />';
  4447.                         } else {
  4448.                             $this->log .= '- add frame : ' . $this->image_frame_colors . '<br />';
  4449.                             $vars = explode(' ', $this->image_frame_colors);
  4450.                         }
  4451.                         $nb = sizeof($vars);
  4452.                         $this->image_dst_x = $this->image_dst_x + ($nb * 2);
  4453.                         $this->image_dst_y = $this->image_dst_y + ($nb * 2);
  4454.                         $tmp = $this->imagecreatenew($this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y);
  4455.                         imagecopy($tmp, $image_dst, $nb, $nb, 0, 0, $this->image_dst_x - ($nb * 2), $this->image_dst_y - ($nb * 2));
  4456.                         $opacity = (is_numeric($this->image_frame_opacity) ? (int) (127 - $this->image_frame_opacity / 100 * 127): 0);                       
  4457.                         for ($i=0; $i<$nb; $i++) {
  4458.                             list($red, $green, $blue) = $this->getcolors($vars[$i]);
  4459.                             $c = imagecolorallocatealpha($tmp, $red, $green, $blue, $opacity);
  4460.                             if ($this->image_frame == 1) {
  4461.                                 imageline($tmp, $i, $i, $this->image_dst_x - $i -1, $i, $c);
  4462.                                 imageline($tmp, $this->image_dst_x - $i -1, $this->image_dst_y - $i -1, $this->image_dst_x - $i -1, $i, $c);
  4463.                                 imageline($tmp, $this->image_dst_x - $i -1, $this->image_dst_y - $i -1, $i, $this->image_dst_y - $i -1, $c);
  4464.                                 imageline($tmp, $i, $i, $i, $this->image_dst_y - $i -1, $c);
  4465.                             } else {
  4466.                                 imageline($tmp, $i, $i, $this->image_dst_x - $i -1, $i, $c);
  4467.                                 imageline($tmp, $this->image_dst_x - $nb + $i, $this->image_dst_y - $nb + $i, $this->image_dst_x - $nb + $i, $nb - $i, $c);
  4468.                                 imageline($tmp, $this->image_dst_x - $nb + $i, $this->image_dst_y - $nb + $i, $nb - $i, $this->image_dst_y - $nb + $i, $c);
  4469.                                 imageline($tmp, $i, $i, $i, $this->image_dst_y - $i -1, $c);
  4470.                             }
  4471.                         }
  4472.                         // we transfert tmp into image_dst
  4473.                         $image_dst = $this->imagetransfer($tmp, $image_dst);
  4474.                     }
  4475.  
  4476.                     // add bevel border
  4477.                     if ($gd_version >= 2 && $this->image_bevel > 0) {
  4478.                         if (empty($this->image_bevel_color1)) $this->image_bevel_color1 = '#FFFFFF';
  4479.                         if (empty($this->image_bevel_color2)) $this->image_bevel_color2 = '#000000';
  4480.                         list($red1, $green1, $blue1) = $this->getcolors($this->image_bevel_color1);
  4481.                         list($red2, $green2, $blue2) = $this->getcolors($this->image_bevel_color2);
  4482.                         $tmp = $this->imagecreatenew($this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y);
  4483.                         imagecopy($tmp, $image_dst, 0, 0, 0, 0, $this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y);
  4484.                         imagealphablending($tmp, true);
  4485.                         for ($i=0; $i<$this->image_bevel; $i++) {
  4486.                             $alpha = round(($i / $this->image_bevel) * 127);
  4487.                             $c1 = imagecolorallocatealpha($tmp, $red1, $green1, $blue1, $alpha);
  4488.                             $c2 = imagecolorallocatealpha($tmp, $red2, $green2, $blue2, $alpha);
  4489.                             imageline($tmp, $i, $i, $this->image_dst_x - $i -1, $i, $c1);
  4490.                             imageline($tmp, $this->image_dst_x - $i -1, $this->image_dst_y - $i, $this->image_dst_x - $i -1, $i, $c2);
  4491.                             imageline($tmp, $this->image_dst_x - $i -1, $this->image_dst_y - $i -1, $i, $this->image_dst_y - $i -1, $c2);
  4492.                             imageline($tmp, $i, $i, $i, $this->image_dst_y - $i -1, $c1);
  4493.                         }
  4494.                         // we transfert tmp into image_dst
  4495.                         $image_dst = $this->imagetransfer($tmp, $image_dst);
  4496.                     }
  4497.  
  4498.                     // add watermark image
  4499.                     if ($this->image_watermark!='' && file_exists($this->image_watermark)) {
  4500.                         $this->log .= '- add watermark<br />';
  4501.                         $this->image_watermark_position = strtolower($this->image_watermark_position);
  4502.                         $watermark_info = getimagesize($this->image_watermark);
  4503.                         $watermark_type = (array_key_exists(2, $watermark_info) ? $watermark_info[2] : null); // 1 = GIF, 2 = JPG, 3 = PNG
  4504.                         $watermark_checked = false;
  4505.                         if ($watermark_type == IMAGETYPE_GIF) {
  4506.                             if (!function_exists('imagecreatefromgif')) {
  4507.                                 $this->error = $this->translate('watermark_no_create_support', array('GIF'));
  4508.                             } else {
  4509.                                 $filter = @imagecreatefromgif($this->image_watermark);
  4510.                                 if (!$filter) {
  4511.                                     $this->error = $this->translate('watermark_create_error', array('GIF'));
  4512.                                 } else {
  4513.                                     $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;watermark source image is GIF<br />';
  4514.                                     $watermark_checked = true;
  4515.                                 }
  4516.                             }
  4517.                         } else if ($watermark_type == IMAGETYPE_JPEG) {
  4518.                             if (!function_exists('imagecreatefromjpeg')) {
  4519.                                 $this->error = $this->translate('watermark_no_create_support', array('JPEG'));
  4520.                             } else {
  4521.                                 $filter = @imagecreatefromjpeg($this->image_watermark);
  4522.                                 if (!$filter) {
  4523.                                     $this->error = $this->translate('watermark_create_error', array('JPEG'));
  4524.                                 } else {
  4525.                                     $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;watermark source image is JPEG<br />';
  4526.                                     $watermark_checked = true;
  4527.                                 }
  4528.                             }
  4529.                         } else if ($watermark_type == IMAGETYPE_PNG) {
  4530.                             if (!function_exists('imagecreatefrompng')) {
  4531.                                 $this->error = $this->translate('watermark_no_create_support', array('PNG'));
  4532.                             } else {
  4533.                                 $filter = @imagecreatefrompng($this->image_watermark);
  4534.                                 if (!$filter) {
  4535.                                     $this->error = $this->translate('watermark_create_error', array('PNG'));
  4536.                                 } else {
  4537.                                     $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;watermark source image is PNG<br />';
  4538.                                     $watermark_checked = true;
  4539.                                 }
  4540.                             }
  4541.                         } else if ($watermark_type == IMAGETYPE_BMP) {
  4542.                             if (!method_exists($this, 'imagecreatefrombmp')) {
  4543.                                 $this->error = $this->translate('watermark_no_create_support', array('BMP'));
  4544.                             } else {
  4545.                                 $filter = @$this->imagecreatefrombmp($this->image_watermark);
  4546.                                 if (!$filter) {
  4547.                                     $this->error = $this->translate('watermark_create_error', array('BMP'));
  4548.                                 } else {
  4549.                                     $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;watermark source image is BMP<br />';
  4550.                                     $watermark_checked = true;
  4551.                                 }
  4552.                             }
  4553.                         } else {
  4554.                             $this->error = $this->translate('watermark_invalid');
  4555.                         }
  4556.                         if ($watermark_checked) {
  4557.                             $watermark_dst_width  = $watermark_src_width  = imagesx($filter);
  4558.                             $watermark_dst_height = $watermark_src_height = imagesy($filter);
  4559.  
  4560.                             // if watermark is too large/tall, resize it first
  4561.                             if ((!$this->image_watermark_no_zoom_out && ($watermark_dst_width > $this->image_dst_x || $watermark_dst_height > $this->image_dst_y))
  4562.                              || (!$this->image_watermark_no_zoom_in && $watermark_dst_width < $this->image_dst_x && $watermark_dst_height < $this->image_dst_y)) {
  4563.                                 $canvas_width  = $this->image_dst_x - abs($this->image_watermark_x);
  4564.                                 $canvas_height = $this->image_dst_y - abs($this->image_watermark_y);                            
  4565.                                 if (($watermark_src_width/$canvas_width) > ($watermark_src_height/$canvas_height)) {
  4566.                                     $watermark_dst_width = $canvas_width;
  4567.                                     $watermark_dst_height = intval($watermark_src_height*($canvas_width / $watermark_src_width));
  4568.                                 } else {
  4569.                                     $watermark_dst_height = $canvas_height;
  4570.                                     $watermark_dst_width = intval($watermark_src_width*($canvas_height / $watermark_src_height));
  4571.                                 }
  4572.                                 $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;watermark resized from '.$watermark_src_width.'x'.$watermark_src_height.' to '.$watermark_dst_width.'x'.$watermark_dst_height.'<br />';
  4573.  
  4574.                             }
  4575.                             // determine watermark position
  4576.                             $watermark_x = 0;
  4577.                             $watermark_y = 0;
  4578.                             if (is_numeric($this->image_watermark_x)) {
  4579.                                 if ($this->image_watermark_x < 0) {
  4580.                                     $watermark_x = $this->image_dst_x - $watermark_dst_width + $this->image_watermark_x;
  4581.                                 } else {
  4582.                                     $watermark_x = $this->image_watermark_x;
  4583.                                 }
  4584.                             } else {
  4585.                                 if (strpos($this->image_watermark_position, 'r') !== false) {
  4586.                                     $watermark_x = $this->image_dst_x - $watermark_dst_width;
  4587.                                 } else if (strpos($this->image_watermark_position, 'l') !== false) {
  4588.                                     $watermark_x = 0;
  4589.                                 } else {
  4590.                                     $watermark_x = ($this->image_dst_x - $watermark_dst_width) / 2;
  4591.                                 }
  4592.                             }
  4593.                             if (is_numeric($this->image_watermark_y)) {
  4594.                                 if ($this->image_watermark_y < 0) {
  4595.                                     $watermark_y = $this->image_dst_y - $watermark_dst_height + $this->image_watermark_y;
  4596.                                 } else {
  4597.                                     $watermark_y = $this->image_watermark_y;
  4598.                                 }
  4599.                             } else {
  4600.                                 if (strpos($this->image_watermark_position, 'b') !== false) {
  4601.                                     $watermark_y = $this->image_dst_y - $watermark_dst_height;
  4602.                                 } else if (strpos($this->image_watermark_position, 't') !== false) {
  4603.                                     $watermark_y = 0;
  4604.                                 } else {
  4605.                                     $watermark_y = ($this->image_dst_y - $watermark_dst_height) / 2;
  4606.                                 }
  4607.                             }
  4608.                             imagealphablending($image_dst, true);
  4609.                             imagecopyresampled($image_dst, $filter, $watermark_x, $watermark_y, 0, 0, $watermark_dst_width, $watermark_dst_height, $watermark_src_width, $watermark_src_height);
  4610.                         } else {
  4611.                             $this->error = $this->translate('watermark_invalid');
  4612.                         }
  4613.                     }
  4614.  
  4615.                     // add text
  4616.                     if (!empty($this->image_text)) {
  4617.                         $this->log .= '- add text<br />';
  4618.  
  4619.                         // calculate sizes in human readable format
  4620.                         $src_size       = $this->file_src_size / 1024;
  4621.                         $src_size_mb    = number_format($src_size / 1024, 1, ".", " ");
  4622.                         $src_size_kb    = number_format($src_size, 1, ".", " ");
  4623.                         $src_size_human = ($src_size > 1024 ? $src_size_mb . " MB" : $src_size_kb . " kb");
  4624.  
  4625.                         $this->image_text = str_replace(
  4626.                             array('[src_name]',
  4627.                                   '[src_name_body]',
  4628.                                   '[src_name_ext]',
  4629.                                   '[src_pathname]',
  4630.                                   '[src_mime]',
  4631.                                   '[src_size]',
  4632.                                   '[src_size_kb]',
  4633.                                   '[src_size_mb]',
  4634.                                   '[src_size_human]',
  4635.                                   '[src_x]',
  4636.                                   '[src_y]',
  4637.                                   '[src_pixels]',
  4638.                                   '[src_type]',
  4639.                                   '[src_bits]',
  4640.                                   '[dst_path]',
  4641.                                   '[dst_name_body]',
  4642.                                   '[dst_name_ext]',
  4643.                                   '[dst_name]',
  4644.                                   '[dst_pathname]',
  4645.                                   '[dst_x]',
  4646.                                   '[dst_y]',
  4647.                                   '[date]',
  4648.                                   '[time]',
  4649.                                   '[host]',
  4650.                                   '[server]',
  4651.                                   '[ip]',
  4652.                                   '[gd_version]'),
  4653.                             array($this->file_src_name,
  4654.                                   $this->file_src_name_body,
  4655.                                   $this->file_src_name_ext,
  4656.                                   $this->file_src_pathname,
  4657.                                   $this->file_src_mime,
  4658.                                   $this->file_src_size,
  4659.                                   $src_size_kb,
  4660.                                   $src_size_mb,
  4661.                                   $src_size_human,
  4662.                                   $this->image_src_x,
  4663.                                   $this->image_src_y,
  4664.                                   $this->image_src_pixels,
  4665.                                   $this->image_src_type,
  4666.                                   $this->image_src_bits,
  4667.                                   $this->file_dst_path,
  4668.                                   $this->file_dst_name_body,
  4669.                                   $this->file_dst_name_ext,
  4670.                                   $this->file_dst_name,
  4671.                                   $this->file_dst_pathname,
  4672.                                   $this->image_dst_x,
  4673.                                   $this->image_dst_y,
  4674.                                   date('Y-m-d'),
  4675.                                   date('H:i:s'),
  4676.                                   (isset($_SERVER['HTTP_HOST']) ? $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'] : 'n/a'),
  4677.                                   (isset($_SERVER['SERVER_NAME']) ? $_SERVER['SERVER_NAME'] : 'n/a'),
  4678.                                   (isset($_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']) ? $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR'] : 'n/a'),
  4679.                                   $this->gdversion(true)),
  4680.                             $this->image_text);
  4681.  
  4682.                         if (!is_numeric($this->image_text_padding)) $this->image_text_padding = 0;
  4683.                         if (!is_numeric($this->image_text_line_spacing)) $this->image_text_line_spacing = 0;
  4684.                         if (!is_numeric($this->image_text_padding_x)) $this->image_text_padding_x = $this->image_text_padding;
  4685.                         if (!is_numeric($this->image_text_padding_y)) $this->image_text_padding_y = $this->image_text_padding;
  4686.                         $this->image_text_position = strtolower($this->image_text_position);
  4687.                         $this->image_text_direction = strtolower($this->image_text_direction);
  4688.                         $this->image_text_alignment = strtolower($this->image_text_alignment);
  4689.  
  4690.                         // if the font is a string, we assume that we might want to load a font
  4691.                         if (!is_numeric($this->image_text_font) && strlen($this->image_text_font) > 4 && substr(strtolower($this->image_text_font), -4) == '.gdf') {
  4692.                             $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;try to load font ' . $this->image_text_font . '... ';
  4693.                             if ($this->image_text_font = @imageloadfont($this->image_text_font)) {
  4694.                                 $this->log .=  'success<br />';
  4695.                             } else {
  4696.                                 $this->log .=  'error<br />';
  4697.                                 $this->image_text_font = 5;
  4698.                             }
  4699.                         }
  4700.  
  4701.                         $text = explode("\n", $this->image_text);
  4702.                         $char_width = imagefontwidth($this->image_text_font);
  4703.                         $char_height = imagefontheight($this->image_text_font);
  4704.                         $text_height = 0;
  4705.                         $text_width = 0;
  4706.                         $line_height = 0;
  4707.                         $line_width = 0;
  4708.  
  4709.                         foreach ($text as $k => $v) {
  4710.                             if ($this->image_text_direction == 'v') {
  4711.                                 $h = ($char_width * strlen($v));
  4712.                                 if ($h > $text_height) $text_height = $h;
  4713.                                 $line_width = $char_height;
  4714.                                 $text_width += $line_width + ($k < (sizeof($text)-1) ? $this->image_text_line_spacing : 0);
  4715.                             } else {
  4716.                                 $w = ($char_width * strlen($v));
  4717.                                 if ($w > $text_width) $text_width = $w;
  4718.                                 $line_height = $char_height;
  4719.                                 $text_height += $line_height + ($k < (sizeof($text)-1) ? $this->image_text_line_spacing : 0);
  4720.                             }
  4721.                         }
  4722.                         $text_width  += (2 * $this->image_text_padding_x);
  4723.                         $text_height += (2 * $this->image_text_padding_y);
  4724.                         $text_x = 0;
  4725.                         $text_y = 0;
  4726.                         if (is_numeric($this->image_text_x)) {
  4727.                             if ($this->image_text_x < 0) {
  4728.                                 $text_x = $this->image_dst_x - $text_width + $this->image_text_x;
  4729.                             } else {
  4730.                                 $text_x = $this->image_text_x;
  4731.                             }
  4732.                         } else {
  4733.                             if (strpos($this->image_text_position, 'r') !== false) {
  4734.                                 $text_x = $this->image_dst_x - $text_width;
  4735.                             } else if (strpos($this->image_text_position, 'l') !== false) {
  4736.                                 $text_x = 0;
  4737.                             } else {
  4738.                                 $text_x = ($this->image_dst_x - $text_width) / 2;
  4739.                             }
  4740.                         }
  4741.                         if (is_numeric($this->image_text_y)) {
  4742.                             if ($this->image_text_y < 0) {
  4743.                                 $text_y = $this->image_dst_y - $text_height + $this->image_text_y;
  4744.                             } else {
  4745.                                 $text_y = $this->image_text_y;
  4746.                             }
  4747.                         } else {
  4748.                             if (strpos($this->image_text_position, 'b') !== false) {
  4749.                                 $text_y = $this->image_dst_y - $text_height;
  4750.                             } else if (strpos($this->image_text_position, 't') !== false) {
  4751.                                 $text_y = 0;
  4752.                             } else {
  4753.                                 $text_y = ($this->image_dst_y - $text_height) / 2;
  4754.                             }
  4755.                         }
  4756.  
  4757.                         // add a background, maybe transparent
  4758.                         if (!empty($this->image_text_background)) {
  4759.                             list($red, $green, $blue) = $this->getcolors($this->image_text_background);
  4760.                             if ($gd_version >= 2 && (is_numeric($this->image_text_background_opacity)) && $this->image_text_background_opacity >= 0 && $this->image_text_background_opacity <= 100) {
  4761.                                 $filter = imagecreatetruecolor($text_width, $text_height);
  4762.                                 $background_color = imagecolorallocate($filter, $red, $green, $blue);
  4763.                                 imagefilledrectangle($filter, 0, 0, $text_width, $text_height, $background_color);
  4764.                                 $this->imagecopymergealpha($image_dst, $filter, $text_x, $text_y, 0, 0, $text_width, $text_height, $this->image_text_background_opacity);
  4765.                                 imagedestroy($filter);
  4766.                             } else {
  4767.                                 $background_color = imagecolorallocate($image_dst ,$red, $green, $blue);
  4768.                                 imagefilledrectangle($image_dst, $text_x, $text_y, $text_x + $text_width, $text_y + $text_height, $background_color);
  4769.                             }
  4770.                         }
  4771.  
  4772.                         $text_x += $this->image_text_padding_x;
  4773.                         $text_y += $this->image_text_padding_y;
  4774.                         $t_width = $text_width - (2 * $this->image_text_padding_x);
  4775.                         $t_height = $text_height - (2 * $this->image_text_padding_y);
  4776.                         list($red, $green, $blue) = $this->getcolors($this->image_text_color);
  4777.  
  4778.                         // add the text, maybe transparent
  4779.                         if ($gd_version >= 2 && (is_numeric($this->image_text_opacity)) && $this->image_text_opacity >= 0 && $this->image_text_opacity <= 100) {
  4780.                             if ($t_width < 0) $t_width = 0;
  4781.                             if ($t_height < 0) $t_height = 0;
  4782.                             $filter = $this->imagecreatenew($t_width, $t_height, false, true);
  4783.                             $text_color = imagecolorallocate($filter ,$red, $green, $blue);
  4784.  
  4785.                             foreach ($text as $k => $v) {
  4786.                                 if ($this->image_text_direction == 'v') {
  4787.                                     imagestringup($filter,
  4788.                                                   $this->image_text_font,
  4789.                                                   $k * ($line_width  + ($k > 0 && $k < (sizeof($text)) ? $this->image_text_line_spacing : 0)),
  4790.                                                   $text_height - (2 * $this->image_text_padding_y) - ($this->image_text_alignment == 'l' ? 0 : (($t_height - strlen($v) * $char_width) / ($this->image_text_alignment == 'r' ? 1 : 2))) ,
  4791.                                                   $v,
  4792.                                                   $text_color);
  4793.                                 } else {
  4794.                                     imagestring($filter,
  4795.                                                 $this->image_text_font,
  4796.                                                 ($this->image_text_alignment == 'l' ? 0 : (($t_width - strlen($v) * $char_width) / ($this->image_text_alignment == 'r' ? 1 : 2))),
  4797.                                                 $k * ($line_height  + ($k > 0 && $k < (sizeof($text)) ? $this->image_text_line_spacing : 0)),
  4798.                                                 $v,
  4799.                                                 $text_color);
  4800.                                 }
  4801.                             }
  4802.                             $this->imagecopymergealpha($image_dst, $filter, $text_x, $text_y, 0, 0, $t_width, $t_height, $this->image_text_opacity);
  4803.                             imagedestroy($filter);
  4804.  
  4805.                         } else {
  4806.                             $text_color = imageColorAllocate($image_dst ,$red, $green, $blue);
  4807.                             foreach ($text as $k => $v) {
  4808.                                 if ($this->image_text_direction == 'v') {
  4809.                                     imagestringup($image_dst,
  4810.                                                   $this->image_text_font,
  4811.                                                   $text_x + $k * ($line_width  + ($k > 0 && $k < (sizeof($text)) ? $this->image_text_line_spacing : 0)),
  4812.                                                   $text_y + $text_height - (2 * $this->image_text_padding_y) - ($this->image_text_alignment == 'l' ? 0 : (($t_height - strlen($v) * $char_width) / ($this->image_text_alignment == 'r' ? 1 : 2))),
  4813.                                                   $v,
  4814.                                                   $text_color);
  4815.                                 } else {
  4816.                                     imagestring($image_dst,
  4817.                                                 $this->image_text_font,
  4818.                                                 $text_x + ($this->image_text_alignment == 'l' ? 0 : (($t_width - strlen($v) * $char_width) / ($this->image_text_alignment == 'r' ? 1 : 2))),
  4819.                                                 $text_y + $k * ($line_height  + ($k > 0 && $k < (sizeof($text)) ? $this->image_text_line_spacing : 0)),
  4820.                                                 $v,
  4821.                                                 $text_color);
  4822.                                 }
  4823.                             }
  4824.                         }
  4825.                     }
  4826.  
  4827.                     // add a reflection
  4828.                     if ($this->image_reflection_height) {
  4829.                         $this->log .= '- add reflection : ' . $this->image_reflection_height . '<br />';
  4830.                         // we decode image_reflection_height, which can be a integer, a string in pixels or percentage
  4831.                         $image_reflection_height = $this->image_reflection_height;
  4832.                         if (strpos($image_reflection_height, '%')>0) $image_reflection_height = $this->image_dst_y * (str_replace('%','',$image_reflection_height / 100));
  4833.                         if (strpos($image_reflection_height, 'px')>0) $image_reflection_height = str_replace('px','',$image_reflection_height);
  4834.                         $image_reflection_height = (int) $image_reflection_height;
  4835.                         if ($image_reflection_height > $this->image_dst_y) $image_reflection_height = $this->image_dst_y;
  4836.                         if (empty($this->image_reflection_opacity)) $this->image_reflection_opacity = 60;
  4837.                         // create the new destination image
  4838.                         $tmp = $this->imagecreatenew($this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y + $image_reflection_height + $this->image_reflection_space, true);
  4839.                         $transparency = $this->image_reflection_opacity;
  4840.  
  4841.                         // copy the original image
  4842.                         imagecopy($tmp, $image_dst, 0, 0, 0, 0, $this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y + ($this->image_reflection_space < 0 ? $this->image_reflection_space : 0));
  4843.  
  4844.                         // we have to make sure the extra bit is the right color, or transparent
  4845.                         if ($image_reflection_height + $this->image_reflection_space > 0) {
  4846.                             // use the background color if present
  4847.                             if (!empty($this->image_background_color)) {
  4848.                                 list($red, $green, $blue) = $this->getcolors($this->image_background_color);
  4849.                                 $fill = imagecolorallocate($tmp, $red, $green, $blue);
  4850.                             } else {
  4851.                                 $fill = imagecolorallocatealpha($tmp, 0, 0, 0, 127);
  4852.                             }
  4853.                             // fill in from the edge of the extra bit
  4854.                             imagefill($tmp, round($this->image_dst_x / 2), $this->image_dst_y + $image_reflection_height + $this->image_reflection_space - 1, $fill);
  4855.                         }
  4856.  
  4857.                         // copy the reflection
  4858.                         for ($y = 0; $y < $image_reflection_height; $y++) {
  4859.                             for ($x = 0; $x < $this->image_dst_x; $x++) {
  4860.                                 $pixel_b = imagecolorsforindex($tmp, imagecolorat($tmp, $x, $y + $this->image_dst_y + $this->image_reflection_space));
  4861.                                 $pixel_o = imagecolorsforindex($image_dst, imagecolorat($image_dst, $x, $this->image_dst_y - $y - 1 + ($this->image_reflection_space < 0 ? $this->image_reflection_space : 0)));
  4862.                                 $alpha_o = 1 - ($pixel_o['alpha'] / 127);
  4863.                                 $alpha_b = 1 - ($pixel_b['alpha'] / 127);
  4864.                                 $opacity = $alpha_o * $transparency / 100;
  4865.                                 if ($opacity > 0) {
  4866.                                     $red   = round((($pixel_o['red']   * $opacity) + ($pixel_b['red']  ) * $alpha_b) / ($alpha_b + $opacity));
  4867.                                     $green = round((($pixel_o['green'] * $opacity) + ($pixel_b['green']) * $alpha_b) / ($alpha_b + $opacity));
  4868.                                     $blue  = round((($pixel_o['blue']  * $opacity) + ($pixel_b['blue'] ) * $alpha_b) / ($alpha_b + $opacity));
  4869.                                     $alpha = ($opacity + $alpha_b);
  4870.                                     if ($alpha > 1) $alpha = 1;
  4871.                                     $alpha =  round((1 - $alpha) * 127);
  4872.                                     $color = imagecolorallocatealpha($tmp, $red, $green, $blue, $alpha);
  4873.                                     imagesetpixel($tmp, $x, $y + $this->image_dst_y + $this->image_reflection_space, $color);
  4874.                                 }
  4875.                             }
  4876.                             if ($transparency > 0) $transparency = $transparency - ($this->image_reflection_opacity / $image_reflection_height);
  4877.                         }
  4878.  
  4879.                         // copy the resulting image into the destination image
  4880.                         $this->image_dst_y = $this->image_dst_y + $image_reflection_height + $this->image_reflection_space;
  4881.                         $image_dst = $this->imagetransfer($tmp, $image_dst);
  4882.                     }
  4883.  
  4884.                     // change opacity
  4885.                     if ($gd_version >= 2 && is_numeric($this->image_opacity) && $this->image_opacity < 100) {
  4886.                         $this->log .= '- change opacity<br />';
  4887.                         // create the new destination image
  4888.                         $tmp = $this->imagecreatenew($this->image_dst_x, $this->image_dst_y, true);
  4889.                         for($y=0; $y < $this->image_dst_y; $y++) {
  4890.                             for($x=0; $x < $this->image_dst_x; $x++) {
  4891.                                 $pixel = imagecolorsforindex($image_dst, imagecolorat($image_dst, $x, $y));
  4892.                                 $alpha = $pixel['alpha'] + round((127 - $pixel['alpha']) * (100 - $this->image_opacity) / 100);
  4893.                                 if ($alpha > 127) $alpha = 127;
  4894.                                 if ($alpha > 0) {
  4895.                                     $color = imagecolorallocatealpha($tmp, $pixel['red'] , $pixel['green'], $pixel['blue'], $alpha);
  4896.                                     imagesetpixel($tmp, $x, $y, $color);
  4897.                                 }
  4898.                             }
  4899.                         }
  4900.                         // copy the resulting image into the destination image
  4901.                         $image_dst = $this->imagetransfer($tmp, $image_dst);
  4902.                     }
  4903.                     
  4904.                     // reduce the JPEG image to a set desired size
  4905.                     if (is_numeric($this->jpeg_size) && $this->jpeg_size > 0 && ($this->image_convert == 'jpeg' || $this->image_convert == 'jpg')) {
  4906.                         // inspired by: JPEGReducer class version 1, 25 November 2004, Author: Huda M ElMatsani, justhuda at netscape dot net
  4907.                         $this->log .= '- JPEG desired file size : ' . $this->jpeg_size . '<br />';
  4908.                         // calculate size of each image. 75%, 50%, and 25% quality
  4909.                         ob_start(); imagejpeg($image_dst,null,75);  $buffer = ob_get_contents(); ob_end_clean();
  4910.                         $size75 = strlen($buffer);
  4911.                         ob_start(); imagejpeg($image_dst,null,50);  $buffer = ob_get_contents(); ob_end_clean();
  4912.                         $size50 = strlen($buffer);
  4913.                         ob_start(); imagejpeg($image_dst,null,25);  $buffer = ob_get_contents(); ob_end_clean();
  4914.                         $size25 = strlen($buffer);
  4915.  
  4916.                         // make sure we won't divide by 0
  4917.                         if ($size50 == $size25) $size50++;
  4918.                         if ($size75 == $size50 || $size75 == $size25) $size75++;
  4919.  
  4920.                         // calculate gradient of size reduction by quality
  4921.                         $mgrad1 = 25 / ($size50-$size25);
  4922.                         $mgrad2 = 25 / ($size75-$size50);
  4923.                         $mgrad3 = 50 / ($size75-$size25);
  4924.                         $mgrad  = ($mgrad1 + $mgrad2 + $mgrad3) / 3;
  4925.                         // result of approx. quality factor for expected size
  4926.                         $q_factor = round($mgrad * ($this->jpeg_size - $size50) + 50);
  4927.  
  4928.                         if ($q_factor<1) {
  4929.                             $this->jpeg_quality=1;
  4930.                         } elseif ($q_factor>100) {
  4931.                             $this->jpeg_quality=100;
  4932.                         } else {
  4933.                             $this->jpeg_quality=$q_factor;
  4934.                         }
  4935.                         $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;JPEG quality factor set to ' . $this->jpeg_quality . '<br />';
  4936.                     }
  4937.  
  4938.                     // converts image from true color, and fix transparency if needed
  4939.                     $this->log .= '- converting...<br />';
  4940.                     switch($this->image_convert) {
  4941.                         case 'gif':
  4942.                             // if the image is true color, we convert it to a palette
  4943.                             if (imageistruecolor($image_dst)) {
  4944.                                 $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;true color to palette<br />';
  4945.                                 // creates a black and white mask
  4946.                                 $mask = array(array());
  4947.                                 for ($x = 0; $x < $this->image_dst_x; $x++) {
  4948.                                     for ($y = 0; $y < $this->image_dst_y; $y++) {
  4949.                                         $pixel = imagecolorsforindex($image_dst, imagecolorat($image_dst, $x, $y));
  4950.                                         $mask[$x][$y] = $pixel['alpha'];
  4951.                                     }
  4952.                                 }
  4953.                                 list($red, $green, $blue) = $this->getcolors($this->image_default_color);
  4954.                                 // first, we merge the image with the background color, so we know which colors we will have
  4955.                                 for ($x = 0; $x < $this->image_dst_x; $x++) {
  4956.                                     for ($y = 0; $y < $this->image_dst_y; $y++) {
  4957.                                         if ($mask[$x][$y] > 0){
  4958.                                             // we have some transparency. we combine the color with the default color
  4959.                                             $pixel = imagecolorsforindex($image_dst, imagecolorat($image_dst, $x, $y));
  4960.                                             $alpha = ($mask[$x][$y] / 127);
  4961.                                             $pixel['red'] = round(($pixel['red'] * (1 -$alpha) + $red * ($alpha)));
  4962.                                             $pixel['green'] = round(($pixel['green'] * (1 -$alpha) + $green * ($alpha)));
  4963.                                             $pixel['blue'] = round(($pixel['blue'] * (1 -$alpha) + $blue * ($alpha)));
  4964.                                             $color = imagecolorallocate($image_dst, $pixel['red'], $pixel['green'], $pixel['blue']);
  4965.                                             imagesetpixel($image_dst, $x, $y, $color);
  4966.                                         }
  4967.                                     }
  4968.                                 }
  4969.                                 // transforms the true color image into palette, with its merged default color
  4970.                                 if (empty($this->image_background_color)) {
  4971.                                     imagetruecolortopalette($image_dst, true, 255);
  4972.                                     $transparency = imagecolorallocate($image_dst, 254, 1, 253);
  4973.                                     imagecolortransparent($image_dst, $transparency);
  4974.                                     // make the transparent areas transparent
  4975.                                     for ($x = 0; $x < $this->image_dst_x; $x++) {
  4976.                                         for ($y = 0; $y < $this->image_dst_y; $y++) {
  4977.                                             // we test wether we have enough opacity to justify keeping the color
  4978.                                             if ($mask[$x][$y] > 120) imagesetpixel($image_dst, $x, $y, $transparency);
  4979.                                         }
  4980.                                     }
  4981.                                 }
  4982.                                 unset($mask);
  4983.                             }
  4984.                             break;
  4985.                         case 'jpg':
  4986.                         case 'bmp':
  4987.                             // if the image doesn't support any transparency, then we merge it with the default color
  4988.                             $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;fills in transparency with default color<br />';
  4989.                             list($red, $green, $blue) = $this->getcolors($this->image_default_color);
  4990.                             $transparency = imagecolorallocate($image_dst, $red, $green, $blue);
  4991.                             // make the transaparent areas transparent
  4992.                             for ($x = 0; $x < $this->image_dst_x; $x++) {
  4993.                                 for ($y = 0; $y < $this->image_dst_y; $y++) {
  4994.                                     // we test wether we have some transparency, in which case we will merge the colors
  4995.                                     if (imageistruecolor($image_dst)) {
  4996.                                         $rgba = imagecolorat($image_dst, $x, $y);
  4997.                                         $pixel = array('red' => ($rgba >> 16) & 0xFF,
  4998.                                                        'green' => ($rgba >> 8) & 0xFF,
  4999.                                                        'blue' => $rgba & 0xFF,
  5000.                                                        'alpha' => ($rgba & 0x7F000000) >> 24);
  5001.                                     } else {
  5002.                                         $pixel = imagecolorsforindex($image_dst, imagecolorat($image_dst, $x, $y));
  5003.                                     }
  5004.                                     if ($pixel['alpha'] == 127) {
  5005.                                         // we have full transparency. we make the pixel transparent
  5006.                                         imagesetpixel($image_dst, $x, $y, $transparency);
  5007.                                     } else if ($pixel['alpha'] > 0) {
  5008.                                         // we have some transparency. we combine the color with the default color
  5009.                                         $alpha = ($pixel['alpha'] / 127);
  5010.                                         $pixel['red'] = round(($pixel['red'] * (1 -$alpha) + $red * ($alpha)));
  5011.                                         $pixel['green'] = round(($pixel['green'] * (1 -$alpha) + $green * ($alpha)));
  5012.                                         $pixel['blue'] = round(($pixel['blue'] * (1 -$alpha) + $blue * ($alpha)));
  5013.                                         $color = imagecolorclosest($image_dst, $pixel['red'], $pixel['green'], $pixel['blue']);
  5014.                                         imagesetpixel($image_dst, $x, $y, $color);
  5015.                                     }
  5016.                                 }
  5017.                             }
  5018.  
  5019.                             break;
  5020.                         default:
  5021.                             break;
  5022.                     }
  5023.  
  5024.                     // interlace options
  5025.                     if($this->image_interlace) imageinterlace($image_dst, true);
  5026.  
  5027.                     // outputs image
  5028.                     $this->log .= '- saving image...<br />';
  5029.                     switch($this->image_convert) {
  5030.                         case 'jpeg':
  5031.                         case 'jpg':
  5032.                             if (!$return_mode) {
  5033.                                 $result = @imagejpeg($image_dst, $this->file_dst_pathname, $this->jpeg_quality);
  5034.                             } else {
  5035.                                 ob_start();
  5036.                                 $result = @imagejpeg($image_dst, null, $this->jpeg_quality);
  5037.                                 $return_content = ob_get_contents();
  5038.                                 ob_end_clean();
  5039.                             }
  5040.                             if (!$result) {
  5041.                                 $this->processed = false;
  5042.                                 $this->error = $this->translate('file_create', array('JPEG'));
  5043.                             } else {
  5044.                                 $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;JPEG image created<br />';
  5045.                             }
  5046.                             break;
  5047.                         case 'png':
  5048.                             imagealphablending( $image_dst, false );
  5049.                             imagesavealpha( $image_dst, true );
  5050.                             if (!$return_mode) {
  5051.                                 if (is_numeric($this->png_compression) && version_compare(PHP_VERSION, '5.1.2') >= 0) {
  5052.                                     $result = @imagepng($image_dst, $this->file_dst_pathname, $this->png_compression);
  5053.                                 } else {
  5054.                                     $result = @imagepng($image_dst, $this->file_dst_pathname);
  5055.                                 }
  5056.                             } else {
  5057.                                 ob_start();
  5058.                                 if (is_numeric($this->png_compression) && version_compare(PHP_VERSION, '5.1.2') >= 0) {
  5059.                                     $result = @imagepng($image_dst, null, $this->png_compression);
  5060.                                 } else {
  5061.                                     $result = @imagepng($image_dst);
  5062.                                 }
  5063.                                 $return_content = ob_get_contents();
  5064.                                 ob_end_clean();
  5065.                             }
  5066.                             if (!$result) {
  5067.                                 $this->processed = false;
  5068.                                 $this->error = $this->translate('file_create', array('PNG'));
  5069.                             } else {
  5070.                                 $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;PNG image created<br />';
  5071.                             }
  5072.                             break;
  5073.                         case 'gif':
  5074.                             if (!$return_mode) {
  5075.                                 $result = @imagegif($image_dst, $this->file_dst_pathname);
  5076.                             } else {
  5077.                                 ob_start();
  5078.                                 $result = @imagegif($image_dst);
  5079.                                 $return_content = ob_get_contents();
  5080.                                 ob_end_clean();
  5081.                             }
  5082.                             if (!$result) {
  5083.                                 $this->processed = false;
  5084.                                 $this->error = $this->translate('file_create', array('GIF'));
  5085.                             } else {
  5086.                                 $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;GIF image created<br />';
  5087.                             }
  5088.                             break;
  5089.                         case 'bmp':
  5090.                             if (!$return_mode) {
  5091.                                 $result = $this->imagebmp($image_dst, $this->file_dst_pathname);
  5092.                             } else {
  5093.                                 ob_start();
  5094.                                 $result = $this->imagebmp($image_dst);
  5095.                                 $return_content = ob_get_contents();
  5096.                                 ob_end_clean();
  5097.                             }
  5098.                             if (!$result) {
  5099.                                 $this->processed = false;
  5100.                                 $this->error = $this->translate('file_create', array('BMP'));
  5101.                             } else {
  5102.                                 $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;BMP image created<br />';
  5103.                             }
  5104.                             break;
  5105.  
  5106.                         default:
  5107.                             $this->processed = false;
  5108.                             $this->error = $this->translate('no_conversion_type');
  5109.                     }
  5110.                     if ($this->processed) {
  5111.                         if (is_resource($image_src)) imagedestroy($image_src);
  5112.                         if (is_resource($image_dst)) imagedestroy($image_dst);
  5113.                         $this->log .= '&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;image objects destroyed<br />';
  5114.                     }
  5115.                 }
  5116.  
  5117.             } else {
  5118.                 $this->log .= '- no image processing wanted<br />';
  5119.  
  5120.                 if (!$return_mode) {
  5121.                     // copy the file to its final destination. we don't use move_uploaded_file here
  5122.                     // if we happen to have open_basedir restrictions, it is a temp file that we copy, not the original uploaded file
  5123.                     if (!copy($this->file_src_pathname, $this->file_dst_pathname)) {
  5124.                         $this->processed = false;
  5125.                         $this->error = $this->translate('copy_failed');
  5126.                     }
  5127.                 } else {
  5128.                     // returns the file, so that its content can be received by the caller
  5129.                     $return_content = @file_get_contents($this->file_src_pathname);
  5130.                     if ($return_content === FALSE) {
  5131.                         $this->processed = false;
  5132.                         $this->error = $this->translate('reading_failed');
  5133.                     }
  5134.                 }
  5135.             }
  5136.         }
  5137.  
  5138.         if ($this->processed) {
  5139.             $this->log .= '- <b>process OK</b><br />';
  5140.         } else {
  5141.             $this->log .= '- <b>error</b>: ' . $this->error . '<br />';
  5142.         }
  5143.  
  5144.         // we reinit all the vars
  5145.         $this->init();
  5146.  
  5147.         // we may return the image content
  5148.         if ($return_mode) return $return_content;
  5149.  
  5150.     }
  5151.  
  5152.     /**
  5153.      * Deletes the uploaded file from its temporary location
  5154.      *
  5155.      * When PHP uploads a file, it stores it in a temporary location.
  5156.      * When you {@link process} the file, you actually copy the resulting file to the given location, it doesn't alter the original file.
  5157.      * Once you have processed the file as many times as you wanted, you can delete the uploaded file.
